line: That’s right. The source of a wizard’s power is their heart.

name: Mitile
line: ...I love you too, nii-sama. But that’s exactly why I don’t want anyone to make fun of you.

name: Rutile
line: The great witch Tiretta. Let’s live our lives to the fullest so that she can feel proud in heaven.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro. Are you done with work for the day?

name: Figaro
line: Yeah. A lot of folks were injured, so it’s been busy since this morning, but I managed to treat everyone.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro! You’re going to tell us about these crests, right?

name: Figaro
line: Before I do, I’m going to introduce you to another wizard with the same crest.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox! It’s Mister Lennox, the shepherd!

name: Mitile
line: It’s been a while! Is the little lamb that I hugged all grown up now?

name: Lennox
line: Yes. He’s growing up big and strong.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox, is there a crest on your body as well....?

name: Mitile
line: You’re right.... It’s the same lily crest.....

name: Rutile
line: So if there are four wizards with new crests.......

name: Figaro
line: It means that none of the Southern wizards who left to fight the < Great Catastrophe > will be coming home......

name: Rutile
line: ....I can’t believe it.... They were all such kind people......

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro..... Does that mean the same thing might happen to us....?

name: Rutile
line: I didn’t realize you were such an amazing person....

name: Figaro
line: See? Feeling a bit better now?

name: Mitile
line: What about you, Dr. Figaro? Is there anything cool about you?

name: Mitile
line: I have to know! The wizards from other countries are going to laugh at us — especially the Northern wizards. They’re extra mean.

name: Figaro
line: But don’t you think Dr. Figaro is cool as he is? My shot-administering techniques have won the whole town over.

name: Lennox
line: ....Dr. Figaro. Have you not told the two of them?

name: Figaro
line: Shh. Stay quiet about that for now.

name: Mitile
line: Ahh, geez, there you go keeping secrets again! You know, Dr. Figaro said he’d stop drinking the other day, but I found a stash of alcohol tucked away in his cabinet!

name: Figaro
line: Sorry, sorry. Keeping secrets just happens to be my hobby.

name: Rutile
line: That’s not a very good hobby, you know?

name: Figaro
line: Forgive me, Rutile. That’s just how I am.

name: Rutile
line: I wonder if everyone in the village will be okay......

name: Figaro
line: Let’s do everything we can before we head on out. The < Great Catastrophe > is shaping up to be a real monster this year. I don’t know when we’ll be able to return.

name: Chapter 6
line: Set Fire to the Magic Headquarters!

name: Akira
line: (I wonder when the new wizards will arrive.....)

name: Heathcliff
line: May I speak to you for a moment, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Ah, I’m sorry. I’m already in my pajamas, so could you give me some time to change?

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah.... Excuse me. Of course; I’ll be waiting right here.

name: Heathcliff
line: No no, it’s fine. Are you headed out to a ball?

name: Akira
line: This does look pretty flashy, doesn’t it?

name: Heathcliff
line: I think it suits you very well. But we may not have time to dance tonight.

name: Cock Robin
line: P-please wait! I’m not suspicious! Please don’t kill me.....!

name: Akira
line: (Ah.... He’s the person who was with the bearded guy I met when I first arrived in this world.....)

name: Murr
line: He was wandering around looking for the entrance to the magic headquarters!

name: Cain
line: We keep the entrance hidden with magic. Those who are officially welcome would be permitted to pass through.

name: Shylock
line: And why were you sneaking around the magic headquarters? What business do you have? Which organization do you belong to?

name: Akira
line: Please wait! I think he was with the old bearded man!

name: Cain
line: I do feel like I’ve met him before.

name: Murr
line: I’m quick to forget things that don’t interest me.

name: Heathcliff
line: So what is the secretary of Central Country doing here?

name: Cock Robin
line: Ah, I guess I was taking a walk.......

name: Shylock
column3: lies will get you nowhere with wizards.

name: Cock Robin
line: I’m sorry.... Sir Drummond ordered me to lure the sage out from the magic headquarters!

name: Cock Robin
line: I-it wasn’t my idea! Those were just my orders!

name: Cock Robin
line: I don’t actually want to do this to you all, after everything you’ve done. You fought against the < Great Catastrophe > for us.

name: Cock Robin
line: Th-that’s.... In order to save the world......

name: Heathcliff
line: But we fought to save the world!

name: Shylock
line: There’s nothing we can do. No matter how great the sacrifices we make; no matter how gently we smile to them....

name: Cain
line: I agree that Minister Drummond and his agency take an overbearing stance towards wizards.

name: Cock Robin
line: Yes! Yes! That’s the sort of thing I wanted to say!

name: Cain
line: Let’s consult Sir Snow and Sir White.

name: Heathcliff
line: A portrait of Sir Snow and Sir White....?

name: Snow in the portrait
line: It’s the same as last night.

name: White in the portrait
line: We’ve gotten trapped inside this portrait.

name: Cain
line: Wait, so that wasn’t a joke!?

name: Snow in the portrait
line: This is no laughing matter, Murr.

name: White in the portrait
line: For some reason, we can’t use magic while we’re in here.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: We’ve tried to escape the frame, but.....

name: Shylock
line: So you can come out of the portrait. Why are you playing around?

name: White
line: Our shadows are still stuck within the frame.

name: Heathcliff
line: How did this happen....? Were you two cursed....?

name: Bradley
line: I removed the barrier around the magic headquarters for you.

name: Bradley
line: And now we’re going to kill those bastards out there. If they attack us, we get to give them what they’re looking for, right?

name: Cock Robin
line: W-wait! Please don’t do anything violent!

name: Heathcliff
line: You were the ones who attacked us first.

name: Shylock
line: Oh, dear. I fear that we might have an all-out war between humans and wizards before the < Great Catastrophe > attacks next year.

name: Murr
line: Ahaha! Peace never lasts; that’s just how it is!

name: Murr
line: We only get along when we have the leisure to care for others. But the world is in absolute chaos now because of the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Akira
line: (A war between humans and wizards...... That would be a complete disaster.)

name: Bradley
line: Shut up, you old geezers. You really think I’m going to listen to you?

name: Bradley
line: Ahaha! Drawing your sword won’t get you anywhere! Some upstart like you can’t stop me!

name: Bradley
line: Shut up! You’ve got some nerve, locking me up like that!

name: Bradley
line: I’m never going back to that prison ce......

name: Heathcliff
line: Where did he go!? Did he run away!?

name: White
line: He was sent flying by some other force.

name: Shylock
line: Some other force.... What a bizarre night this is shaping up to be.

name: Cain
line: For now, we need to figure out how to handle the minister and his forces — they’ll be here any moment now.

name: Cain
line: Yeah. Cock Robin mentioned it earlier, remember? Don’t worry. I’ll handle.....

name: Drummond
line: No need to hold back! Cock Robin should’ve gotten the Sage out of there!

name: Soldier
line: The magic headquarters suddenly appeared out of thin air.....

name: Soldier
line: Isn’t this all a trap set up by the wizards?

name: Drummond
line: Do not flinch! We must punish the wizards for kidnapping the Sage!

name: Shylock
line: I suppose we have no choice but to fight. Let’s go and shake them off, Murr.

name: Akira
line: Um, we’re supposed to be fighting the < Great Catastrophe >, right?

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin, why are you attacking the wizards?

name: Cock Robin
line: We’re not trying to attack them! We simply want to keep the wizards under control, because they’re disturbing the peace.......

name: Snow
line: What a convenient definition of "peace" you have.

name: White
line: You made us fight the < Great Catastrophe >, and yet you demand even more of us.

name: Cock Robin
line: That’s because we can’t fend it off ourselves! But we are grateful to you all!

name: Murr
line: Okay, then this is a party!

name: Cock Robin
line: It’s certainly not a party, but.....

name: Akira
line: (I see.... Humans are afraid of wizards....)

name: Shylock
line: Well, I’ll head out and calm them down for now. Do not worry—....

name: Snow
line: It seems like we truly are feeling the effects of the < Great Catastrophe >......

name: White
line: We got too close to the < Great Catastrophe > — and suffered invisible wounds as a result of last night’s battle.

name: Snow
line: Indeed. We might not have realized it at the time, but our souls all sustained serious wounds.

name: White
line: And each of our wounds manifests itself differently. Take, for example, Cain’s eyes and Bradley’s disappearance. And us, trapped in our portrait.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Here come the soldiers. Sir Sage, please stand behind me! I will protect you.

name: Cain
line: Heath! Take care of Shylock.... And also Sir Snow and Sir White!

name: Heathcliff
line: Got it... —Uh, that’s a lot of people!?

name: Cain
line: Murr. You come with me. Tell me where the enemy is!

name: Cain
line: I’ll leave the rest to you!

name: Akira
line: Heathcliff, please take care of Shylock. I’ll hold Snow and White’s portrait!

name: Heathcliff
line: Thank you! Let’s escape to the magic tower for now! Shylock, are you all right?

name: Shylock
line: .....gh.... I wonder.... Would you like to swap places with me and find out?

name: Heathcliff
line: No way, I don’t want my heart to burn up..... ....I hope my wound isn’t painful......

name: Heathcliff
line: Hurry, this way! Let’s hide in the tower!

name: Heathcliff
line: The courtyard is on fire! Someone must have shot a flaming arrow..... ....Do they hate us that much.....

name: Snow
line: That’s not it. They’re simply afraid.

name: White
line: Those overwhelmed with fear will do anything to protect themselves and those important to them.

name: Heathcliff
line: But that doesn’t mean they should.... ......!

name: Soldier
line: There they are! Get them with arrows!

name: Soldier
line: We need to attack them before they kill us with their magical fire! Don’t hold back!

name: Faust
line: ....So the humans came to attack us......

name: Faust
line: That sounds just like them..... They’re quick to fear, quick to welter, and quick to attack.

name: White
line: Hurting humans will only exacerbate the problem. You must hold back.

name: Faust
line: I did hold back. In the distant past.

name: Soldier
line: More wizards are coming to attack us!?

name: Shino
line: I’m Shino, an Eastern wizard. I’ll be in your care.

name: Nero
line: .......Eastern wizard, Nero. ......Well, nice to meet you......

name: Riquet
line: I’m Riquet, a Central wizard. I don’t know much about the outside world, but...... Please take care of me.

name: Rustica
line: I’m Rustica, a Western wizard. Thank you for inviting me here. By the way, has anyone seen my bride?

name: Chloe
line: I’m the Western wizard Chloe! I've been travelling the world with Rustica, and I used to be a tailor. Um, I hope we can get along!

name: Rutile
line: I’m Rutile, a Southern wizard. I was a teacher in the South. I’m glad to meet you all.

name: Mitile
line: I’m Mitile, a wizard of the South! I’m the great witch Tiretta’s son. Ahem. Pleased to meet you.

name: Lennox
line: ....Lennox. I’m a Southern wizard. Nice to meet you.

name: Figaro
line: I’m the Southern wizard Figaro. Please take care of me.

name: Arthur
line: I’m Arthur, a Central wizard. Sir Sage, I look forward to working with you.

name: Chloe
line: A fire!? And soldiers!? What’s happening!?

name: Rustica
line: I put on my best introduction, but it looks like everyone is rather busy at the moment.

name: Mitile
line: Are the Sage’s wizards being attacked by soldiers? But why?

name: Shino
line: Who cares why? I’m here to help the Sage’s wizards.

name: Figaro
line: We shouldn’t attack the military using magic — it’ll just complicate things for the future. Leno, can I count on you?

name: Rutile
line: Mister Leno! Let me help you!

name: Soldier
line: H-he’s gonna kill us! Fire your arrows!

name: Soldier
line: Make a run for it when he flinches.....!

name: Riquet
line: ....I don’t know any shepherds like him......

name: Drummond
line: These damn wizards...... Did they use fire magic!? Are they trying to burn our soldiers to the ground!?

name: Soldier
line: Sir Drummond! We’ve been ordered to stop fighting!

name: Drummond
line: Ordered to stop fighting!? Who aside from me is allowed to issue commands to these soldiers!?

name: Arthur
line: Minister! Why did you attack the magic headquarters!?

name: Drummond
line: P-Prince Arthur......! It’s because the wizards attacked my subordinates, and......

name: Arthur
line: You were the ones who attacked them! I clearly recall telling you to let them rest and to invite them to the castle!

name: Drummond
line: It’s for your sake, Prince Arthur! I’m trying to make sure these wizards won’t trick you into—....

name: Arthur
line: Stop calling them "these wizards." I too am a wizard.

name: Arthur
line: .....Please apologize and help to restore the magic headquarters. Anyone would be furious if you attacked their home.

name: Shylock
line: It seems to have subsided.... Were you worried about me, Murr?

name: Murr
line: Did it make your heart pound? Did you cry? Man, if you cried, I wish I could have seen it myself!

name: Shylock
line: Fufu. One day, I’ll inflict the exact same pain on you, and take delight in your screams as I open a fresh bottle of wine. Just you wait.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Lennox, I didn’t know you were so strong! You were really cool back there!

name: Lennox
line: Ah, thanks. ....I wonder where he went......

name: Rutile
line: It was amazing. Please show us that move one more time!

name: Shino
line: Those guys are so excitable..... Are they from the South?

name: Figaro
line: And you’re the hot-blooded kid from earlier. Are you by chance the Eastern wizard Shino?

name: Shino
line: I am. How did you know?

name: Figaro
line: I heard from a friend of mine that there was a young, powerful wizard in the East, and you seemed to fit the description.

name: Shino
line: Figaro. I’ll get real tall next year, and look down on that head of yours.

name: Figaro
line: Ahahaha, my bad. Let’s get along, Shino.

name: Mitile
line: Who is that guy....? Wasn’t he being kind of rude to you, Dr. Figaro?

name: Figaro
line: He’s the guardian of the Eastern forest. The woodlands there are so dense and vast that they’re impossible to navigate without a guide.

name: Mitile
line: Huh, that’s amazing..... But I’m good at giving people directions too. And I know how to read maps.

name: Figaro
line: You’re right, Mitile. You’ve got a promising future as well.

name: Rutile
line: Here we go. I’ll help you guys clean up. Where should I put this chair?

name: Rutile
line: All right. Mister Lennox, they want it over here.

name: Rutile
line: Woah.... Ahaha. Mister Leno, you speak so leisurely.

name: Rutile
line: Oh, how kind of you. Thank you very much.

name: Soldier
line: A-are you sure he wasn’t just being sarcastic? Or maybe he was cursing us.....

name: Soldier
line: This is because your fellow wizards—....!

name: Rutile
line: There we go. You should be fine now; please take care.

name: Rutile
line: He was injured, so I healed his wounds. It looks like everyone is hurt all over.

name: Lennox
line: Well, getting injured is a soldier’s job, after all.

name: Rutile
line: That’s incredible. I’d be so concerned if the same thing happened to my students.

name: Riquet
line: I’d like to speak with whoever is in charge here.

name: Riquet
line: There’s a strange mark on my forehead — the fact that it’s so prominent is causing me trouble. Are you an authorized party?

name: Nero
line: Nope, I was dragged into this too. Go find someone else if you have a complaint......

name: Riquet
line: Sorry for the sudden request, but could you erase this mark from my forehead? I’ll leave immediately once that’s done.

name: Chloe
line: Huh? You can erase this thing? Rustica said you couldn’t.

name: Chloe
line: I feel you. Sometimes you just want to switch up your style — I want it to match my outfit for the day, you know?

name: Riquet
line: Dressing up is an extravagance for the vain. Wizards, who are the disciples of God, need to be frugal......

name: Chloe
line: What’s a disciple of god.....? You don’t like dressing up.....?

name: Riquet
line: I see you’ve been tainted by worldly desires. How tragic.

name: Riquet
line: Where is this person in charge called Mister Rustica?

name: Riquet
line: You heard about this mark on my forehead from Mister Rustica, right?

name: Chloe
line: Oh, Rustica just happened to know about it. But I wouldn’t say he’s in charge of anything......

name: Chloe
line: Oh, this is Rustica. I’m Chloe. What’s your name?

name: Riquet
line: My name is Riquet. Mister Rustica, if you’re not the person in charge here, who is your superior?

name: Rustica
line: My superior? You mean in terms of age? Or height?

name: Riquet
line: Someone with a position superior to yours.

name: Rustica
line: Then I guess that would be my bride? I would follow any order of hers, no matter what she told me to do.

name: Riquet
line: I understand. It is our duty as the disciples of God.

name: Rustica
line: Great; I think we will get along.

name: Chloe
line: You guys are on totally different wavelengths, but you still managed to become friends. Can you teach me how to do that?

name: Arthur
line: I am Arthur, the prince of Central Country. I deeply apologize for this commotion.

name: Akira
line: D-don’t say that...... Please raise your head.

name: Heathcliff
line: ......Sir Sage is kneeling. Should we kneel too?

name: Cain
line: I guess so...... Let’s put Sir Snow and Sir White’s portrait face down for now.

name: White in the portrait
line: Don’t do that! Put us back up!

name: Akira
line: Prince Arthur. I’ve heard so much about you. Or rather......

name: Arthur
line: The sage’s manual...... If you can read those words, that must mean you came from the same country as he did — Japan.

name: Akira
line: Yes, I think so....... The previous sage said you were like a kind little brother to him.

name: Arthur
line: I regret not being able to say a proper goodbye, but I’m glad to hear that. And I am also happy to meet you, Sir Sage.

name: Arthur
line: Like him, you also came from a distant world, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes. And I’d like to return to my world...... That’s why I wanted to meet you.

name: Arthur
line: I see...... Forgive me; I might have been waylaid by my responsibilities as the prince, but it still took me far too long to arrive.

name: Arthur
line: ......Sir Sage...... I’m sorry I couldn’t meet your expectations.

name: Akira
line: Please, don’t worry about it. Ah...... To be honest, I still really want to go home.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage. I feel the same way.

name: Akira
line: Yes! I’d love to be of help.

name: Arthur
line: Um...... Would you happen to know where Sir Oz is......

name: At his question, I recall the remark in the sage’s manual:
Akira
line: Ah...... He’s not around right now. So don’t worry.

name: Akira
line: (Huh? So maybe they do get along?)

name: Arthur also picks up on the implication behind my words, and blinks with wide, curious eyes as he asks me:
Akira
line: Ah, well...... I thought you didn’t want to run into each other......

name: Arthur
line: Did Sir Oz say that to you?

name: Akira
line: No, I think I’ve just misunderstood something. Sorry, don’t worry about it.

name: Akira
line: Are you acquainted with Oz, Prince Arthur?

name: Arthur
line: Please call me Arthur, Sir Sage. Rather than acquaintances, Sir Oz and I are......

name: Cock Robin
line: Your Highness! We’ve more or less finished cleaning up the magic headquarters!

name: Cock Robin
line: We still need to tidy up a few things here and there, so we can continue working if necessary, but......

name: Arthur
line: No, it’s already late. Everyone must be exhausted, so please go home, and come back another day to take care of repairs.

name: Cock Robin
line: I understand. What about you, Your Highness?

name: Arthur
line: I’ll stay here, and head back after I’ve spoken with the other wizards.

name: Cock Robin
line: Then let me arrange for a bodyguard......

name: Arthur
line: I don’t need one. This isn’t a battlefield.

name: Cock Robin
line: But the roads are dangerous at night.

name: Arthur
line: What’s so dangerous about them? I’m not a sheltered princess, and unlike you guys, I can fly.

name: A pang of nostalgia strikes my chest
line: the sight reminds me of the lights spilling out from the windows of the last train home from work.

name: Cock Robin
line: What a kind person he is...... Even though his own mother, the Queen, abandoned him in the Northern mountains when he was a child......

name: Arthur
line: There. You should be fine now.

name: Arthur
line: Be careful on your way home.

name: Cock Robin
line: I’m very sorry for everything that happened, Sir Sage. Please convey my apologies to the wizards as well.

name: Arthur
line: Like him, there are people who are willing to understand wizards......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage, how are you feeling tonight? Are you exhausted?

name: Arthur
line: Then shall we host a mixer1?

name: I can hardly believe my ears
line: did the prince suddenly start speaking like a party animal?

name: Arthur
line: Yes. Before we talk about building bridges between wizards and humans, I think we need to communicate with each other first as wizards.

name: Akira
line: Um, may I ask a question?

name: Akira
line: What do you mean when you say "mixer"......

name: Arthur
line: Oh, I apologize. The previous sage mentioned it, so I assumed you knew what it was.

name: Akira
line: (The previous sage sure had a way with words....... How am I supposed to correct him.......)

name: Arthur
line: Great! Then let’s get this mixer started right away. Do you like mixers, Sir Sage?

name: Arthur
line: The previous sage seemed to love them. He said he would definitely invite me if he ever held one here in this world.

name: Arthur
line: I’m thinking of setting aside a day of national celebration, and calling it "National Mixer Day".

name: Akira
line: P-perhaps you should come up with a different name for a national holiday?

name: Arthur
line: Well, I guess for now we can just enjoy the mixer in front of our eyes with everyone here.

name: 1) Akira reacts this way because Arthur uses the term goukon
line: basically a group date where single men and women go out, get to know each other, and play social games in the hopes of finding an interested partner

name: Arthur
line: I’m Arthur, a wizard from Central. I’ve met Cain before.

name: Cain
line: I was a knight of Central Country. It’s an honor to meet you again like this.

name: Riquet
line: I’m Riquet, a Central wizard. I was a disciple of God who spread the teachings of the Church. Excuse me, who is the person in charge here?

name: Cain
line: Person in charge...... Sir Sage only just arrived, so......

name: Shylock
line: If we’re going by age, shouldn’t it be Sir Snow and Sir White, since they’re the oldest?

name: Snow
line: Stop shoving responsibility onto the elderly.

name: White
line: We’ve lived this long because we avoided taking responsibility for anything, you know?

name: Murr
line: Isn’t it Oz? He’s not here right now, but he is the strongest.

name: Riquet
line: So Oz is the person in charge then? I see.

name: Arthur
line: That’s an excellent question. Does anyone know?

name: Cain
line: I’ll introduce him instead. Oz is a Central wizard.

name: Shylock
line: I’m the Western wizard Shylock. I was the teacher of the Western wizards — just in name, though.

name: Murr
line: I’m the Western wizard Murr! I love shiny things!

name: Rustica
line: Murr? Are you the famous philosopher?

name: Rustica
line: How unexpected. I’m honored to meet you, Philosopher Murr.

name: Rustica
line: He’s a very knowledgeable scholar, and one of the greatest minds of our era. His research involves the truth of the universe, and the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Chloe
line: .............!? What was that!? Is this what they say about the thin line between geniuses and freaks?

name: Rustica
line: What a magnificent cry. I’m impressed.

name: Shylock
line: It’s been a while since I met someone with praise for Murr. May I ask for your names?

name: Rustica
line: My, I apologize. My name is Rustica. And this is Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Hello, I’m Chloe. I’ve been traveling with Rustica, and he’s been teaching me magic over the course of our journey.

name: Shylock
line: Were you traveling with a purpose? Or was it a journey without a goal?

name: Rustica
line: We’re on a journey to find my lost bride.

name: Shylock
line: A journey of love, I see. What kind of person is she?

name: Chloe
line: Um, I'm sorry.... It's kind of, uh, really hard to explain....

name: Shylock
line: No worries. I'm quite familiar with lunatics.

name: Murr
line: Lunatics are the best! I love all things weird!

name: Rustica
line: Sir Sage, you came from an unknown world — were you on a journey too?

name: Akira
line: I wasn’t traveling, but...... Before I knew it, I ended up here.

name: Rustica
line: That’s nice. You didn’t have to go through the trouble of packing.

name: Chloe
line: How are you going to get back? Can I visit your world too, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: We actually don’t know how I can return yet...... We’re currently searching for a way.

name: Chloe
line: Then, when you find out how to get home, take me with you! Until then, I’ll make lots of clothes for you, Sir Sage.

name: Rustica
line: Chloe is very clever with his hands.

name: Chloe
line: Ehehe. See, I designed and made Rustica’s clothes. I’ll make clothes for everyone else too!

name: Shylock
line: Faust, how about you ask him to make you some clothes? Weren’t yours ruined during our last battle?

name: Shylock
line: Please introduce the Eastern wizards next.

name: Akira
line: Um, if you’re still feeling unwell, please don’t force yourself......

name: Heathcliff
line: Ah.... Mr. Faust kept all the Eastern wizards together. He’s my teacher.

name: Faust
line: There is no reason for you to treat me like a teacher.

name: Faust
line: Two of us turned to stone.

name: Riquet
line: You said your name was Faust. Are you by any chance the holy wizard Faust, who was said to be involved in the founding of the Central Country Kingdom?

name: Akira
line: Ah... Um, there was a wizard like that?

name: Riquet
line: Yes. He’s a noble wizard who dedicated his life to serving humans. Father Priest always told me to look to him as my role model.

name: Cain
line: Heath and I are close in age, so we hung out pretty often. I’ll introduce you later, Prince Arthur. You too, Riquet.

name: Arthur
line: I see. Nice to meet you.

name: Nero
line: Okay, guess I’m next, then...... I’m Nero. Uh..... That’s all.

name: Faust
line: Are you stupid? You told us absolutely nothing about yourself.

name: Nero
line: You pretty much did the same.......

name: Nero
line: Nevermind..... Uh, I ran a restaurant in Eastern Country.

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama, did you hear that? He ran his own restaurant.

name: Rutile
line: That’s amazing. You must be a wonderful chef.

name: Nero
line: Uh, thanks..... And that’s why I’d like to go back as soon as I can......

name: Shylock
line: That’s absolutely fine. Up till now, no one but the Sage lived in this building — the only time we all got together was to defeat the catastrophe.....

name: Cain
line: It turned ten of our comrades to stone. In order to prevent such a tragedy from repeating itself, we need to train together and plan ahead; I want us to build our sense of unity as a group.

name: Cain
line: We’re all going to live here together and prepare for the next attack.

name: Cain
line: We’re all going to live here together and prepare for the next attack.

name: Snow
line: I think that’s a good plan.

name: White
line: I agree. We have ten new wizards, after all. It would be quite difficult for all of us to work together on short notice.

name: Snow
line: On top of that, there’s the issue of our bizarre injuries. How does that sound to you all?

name: Shino
line: I’m fine with that. I can sleep anywhere so long as I have a roof over my head.

name: Shino
line: Shino, an Eastern wizard. I’m the guardian of Sherwood Forest, and a servant of the Blanchett family.

name: Faust
line: ....The Blanchett family? So you mean Heath’s family?

name: Faust
line: ....Why don’t any of you know how to introduce yourselves?

name: Nero
line: I mean, considering the example that you set.....

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey, be polite. Mr. Faust is our teacher.

name: Shino
line: I haven’t learned a single thing from him. Besides his name.

name: Faust
line: And I haven’t been paid for any services. Are you Heathcliff’s friend?

name: I can feel a sharp tension in the air
line: the two of them are keenly aware of each other, yet stubbornly refuse to make eye contact.

name: Shino
line: I serve Master and Mistress — Heath just happens to be their child.

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes, that’s right. And you just happen to be one of our servants.

name: Nero
line: What’s going on...? Are you two fighting....?

name: Faust
line: And I don’t care. But Shino, listen to me.

name: Faust
line: This was Heathcliff’s first battle. And it was a bitter, traumatic one
column3: he lost two comrades right before his eyes.

name: Faust
line: Be kind to him, at least for tonight.

name: Faust
line: Good. That’s it for Eastern Country introductions. Next.

name: Akira
line: (And I hear he was gravely injured protecting his comrade....)

name: Figaro
line: I guess we’ll go through our introductions next. But first, can I ask a question?

name: Figaro
line: Did the Southern wizards chosen before us all turn to stone?

name: White
line: The kind Southern wizards stepped forward and tried to protect the rest of us.....

name: Rutile
line: .....I see..... They were such kind people, after all......

name: Figaro
line: I see..... Ah, I mean. I had prepared myself for this news, as unfortunate as it is.

name: Mitile
line: Train us.... You say that, but doesn’t that go for you too, Dr. Figaro?

name: Figaro
line: Can the cute little twins over there stay quiet for a second?

name: White
line: Then I guess we can stay quiet.

name: Figaro
line: Somewhat. Ah, excuse me, I’m getting sidetracked.

name: Rustica
line: So you’re a doctor? That’s wonderful.

name: Figaro
line: Thank goodness I’m a wizard. Because even if I slip up during a surgery, I can always get away with it by turning my patient into a zombie.

name: Rutile
line: I’m Rutile. I teach at a school in the South. And this is my little brother Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: I’m Mitile. I'm in school, but I’m also learning magic from Dr. Figaro.

name: Akira
line: Of course. Please do your best.

name: Shino
line: Plus, they’re easily swayed by their emotions. No matter where you go, Southern wizards just drag the rest of us down.

name: Shino
line: It’s better to tell them now — so they won’t get wiped out later.

name: Mitile
line: ....Yeah, well, Eastern wizards have terrible personalities and foul mouths.

name: Mitile
line: Eastern wizards and Northern wizards give all of us wizards a bad reputation!

name: Faust
line: Oh? Are you saying the wizards of Southern Country would’ve solved the problem by letting them burn you to the ground?

name: Figaro
line: Don’t take it the wrong way, Faust.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro! You said that wizards and humans should help each other!

name: Figaro
line: I did say that. I sure did say that.

name: Faust
line: You irresponsible man..... You haven’t changed in the least.

name: Figaro
line: I guess he might be, you know?

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust — Central Country’s founding hero. I am the wizard Lennox who fought under your command.

name: Lennox
line: ....Thank you for catching the plates. But why are you so surprised?

name: Mitile
line: Because we thought you were just a normal shepherd until yesterday. And now you’re an weathered warrior and all.....

name: Rutile
line: And you were searching for someone all this time? Why didn’t you tell us? You could’ve talked to us about it.

name: Snow
line: Goodness gracious, everyone here seems to be tangled up in connections.

name: White
line: It looks like this year’s < Great Catastrophe > will be just as troublesome.

name: Snow
line: Lastly, we’ll introduce the Northern wizards

name: White
line: I’m the Northern wizard, White. The two of us make one.

name: White
line: You could also say they’re not......

name: Mitile
line: ......There’s no way the Northern wizards will work with us......

name: Akira
line: Rather than pointing fingers...... How about we try to figure out what we can accomplish together, and work on that instead?

name: Akira
line: Well...... You all seem to say whatever you want...... So I don’t feel like anyone’s lying......

name: Akira
line: The Northern wizards seem like a scary bunch, but...... It’d be nice if we could get along in time.......

name: Cain
line: If we want the Northern wizards to cooperate, we’re going to need Oz’s help.

name: Figaro
line: I feel the same way. I’m speaking as a newcomer here, but the last < Great Catastrophe > was unlike any of the attacks that came before.

name: Arthur
line: It’s just as Sir Figaro says. Sir Sage......

name: Arthur
line: I’m thinking of holding a series of events for the Sage and his wizards
column3: victory parades, parties, and of course, the inauguration ceremony.

name: Akira
line: I agree...... I’ve only met him once, but Oz seemed reliable.

name: Akira
line: ......No, it’s nothing. Let’s go persuade Oz.

name: Arthur
line: Yes. I’ll do my best, Sir Sage.

name: Snow
line: Then it’s decided. That’s enough for tonight.

name: White
line: All of you can feel free to choose a room to rest in.

name: Chloe
line: I’m glad everyone seems nice! Rustica, I’ll go find a room for you.

name: Cain
line: I thought we were just going to introduce ourselves, but it basically turned into a meeting. Heath, introduce me to your friend.

name: Rutile
line: Mitile. You shouldn’t be so rude.

name: Mitile
line: But...... That guy was so rude...... Um, can I share a room with you, nii-sama?

name: Rutile
line: There’s nothing to be scared of here. You’re all grown up now, so you should sleep alone.

name: Rutile
line: Don’t worry. Father and Mother are watching over you from heaven, Mitile.

name: Faust
line: Leave me alone. You’ve got the wrong man.

name: Riquet
line: Shall I take the room next to you?

name: Riquet
line: Yes, gladly. I’ve been taught to help the small and the weak, after all.

name: Mitile
line: I’m not weak! But thank you......

name: Riquet
line: Not at all. This is my job as a disciple of God.

name: Shylock
line: You’re a chef, is that right?

name: Shylock
line: Great. Can I leave tomorrow’s breakfast preparations to you?

name: Nero
line: Well...... Sure...... If it’s just breakfast......

name: Shylock
line: Thank you. The kitchen is that way. ......Oh?

name: Murr
line: I’m gonna smoke Snow and White!

name: Vincent
line: ......Arthur has been chosen as one of the Sage’s wizards?

name: Soldier
line: Yes. It seems like he’s been summoned to the magic headquarters! Now that Prince Arthur is one of the chosen wizards, the people must feel more relieved!

name: Cain
line: Oz lives in the North, but he’s a Central wizard. I think it’s better for just the Central wizards to go; he probably wouldn’t be too pleased if all of us showed up.

name: Akira
line: If Oz becomes our leader, will the Northern wizards cooperate with us?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. Because no one can stand up to Oz.

name: Arthur
line: Even if Sir Oz isn’t around, we will protect you, Sir Sage. Cain, how are your eyes?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. I couldn’t see you guys earlier, but I can now.

name: Riquet
line: Perhaps you can’t see people until you touch them?

name: Riquet
line: Just now, our eyes met after I touched him.

name: Akira
line: Now that you mention it...... I think that was the case for me as well.

name: Cain
line: Now that you mention it, that might be true.......

name: Arthur
line: I’m glad we figured out a solution, Cain.

name: Cain
line: Yeah. It’s all thanks to you, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: ......Please stop. I’m a disciple of God — only those who have committed virtuous deeds are allowed to touch my body.

name: Cain
line: What’s this "disciple of God" that you speak of?

name: Riquet
line: It means those of us who have this mysterious power. We have been sent by God to grant miracles to His chosen ones.

name: Arthur
line: I’ve heard of this...... There’s a church that refers to wizards as gods and disciples.

name: Riquet
line: The outside world is corrupted. So once this tainted mark on my forehead is erased, I intend to return to the Church.

name: Arthur
line: The outside world isn’t corrupted. Not everything is good and pure, but I believe there are many things that will bring you happiness, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: I don’t believe you. I saw people fighting yesterday too.

name: Arthur
line: As long as you’re happy, it doesn’t matter which world you live in. We won’t steal away your happiness.

name: Arthur
line: Because if you come to despair in your world, there will be nowhere left for you to go.

name: Arthur
line: Paradise can exist anywhere. Even if, someday, you come to be abandoned — in time you’ll find someone else who needs you.

name: Cain
line: That’s right. Plus, I can’t see your face unless I touch you. It’d be troublesome if I couldn’t do that.

name: Riquet
line: Woah...... Please stop touching my head.

name: Cain
line: Ahaha! Sorry, my bad. All right, Sir Sage, Your Highness. Shall we go?

name: Cain
line: We’ll take this elevator to the Northern tower.

name: Akira
line: It’s pretty convenient how you can cross national borders with an elevator.

name: Cain
line: The elevator is fueled by mana stones. Mana stones are like fossils which contain magical energy.

name: Riquet
line: Do you know where in Northern Country we can find Oz?

name: Arthur
line: I think Sir Oz is probably in his castle in the North.

name: Cain
line: I wonder if we can find it. I hear that it’s shrouded in so many layers of illusion that few have ever seen it.

name: Arthur
line: When I was born, the whole country celebrated my birth. But my father and mother kept one thing a secret.

name: Riquet
line: She threw away her own child!? How horrifying......

name: Arthur
line: I don’t blame her — she must have felt truly desperate.

name: Arthur
line: He saved my frozen soul, provided me with meals, and gave me a bed to sleep in. He even taught me magic.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz is a kind person. People often misunderstand him, but......

name: Cain
line: Why? Did you fight before you left?

name: Arthur
line: I don’t know...... When my father fell ill, and his servants came searching for me......

name: Arthur
line: ......It looks like we’ve arrived. Sorry...... I got carried away talking about myself.

name: Akira
line: No...... I’m glad you told us about what happened between you and Oz.

name: Akira
line: (The air is so clear...... The snow and the forests smell almost primordial......)

name: Cain
line: You’re right...... The weather was miserable the last time I came, but Northern Country is beautiful when the sun’s out.

name: Arthur
line: I’m happy to hear that. The North is like a second home to me.

name: I know this by now
line: an unnatural wind marks the presence of a wizard.

name: Oz
line: What business do you have in these remote lands?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, please hear us out.

name: Oz
line: I’m telling you to go home.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, it’s me, Arthur. I might have grown taller, but I’m Arthur — the boy you raised.

name: Arthur
line: I apologize for not even sending a letter after all this time. Please, forgive me for my ingratitude.

name: Cain
line: That’s right, Oz. Come to the magic headquarters, and lead us. You’re the only one who can.

name: Oz
line: This has nothing to do with you, knight from Central.

name: Cain
line: It has everything to do with me. He is my lord. And you are my comrade.

name: Riquet
line: Oz! I hear that you’re the strongest wizard in the land.

name: Oz
line: That goes for us all. We are all burdened with roles we never wished for.

name: Oz
line: Sage. Do not get involved with me. Take them back to the magic headquarters in Central.

name: Oz
line: This is no place for people like you.

name: Arthur
line: I have also been summoned. I, too, am one of the wizards at the magic headquarters!

name: Cain
line: Please cheer up, Your Highness...... I’m sure you’ll make up one day.

name: Riquet
line: I can’t escape from this role......?

name: Cain
line: Let’s return to the magic headquarters. Right now.

name: Riquet
line: ......Is that a Grand Dragon.......? I thought they had gone extinct in the distant past......?

name: Cain
line: That wasn’t my imagination, right...... Did you guys see it too?

name: Arthur
line: Yes....... That was indeed a Grand Dragon, like the ones I’ve seen illustrated in books......

name: Riquet
line: I thought unicorns were the only creatures who could wield magic like us?

name: Cain
line: To think that even the Grand Dragon would come back to life...... Was this also caused by the < Great Catastrophe >......?

name: Shino
line: Looks like you ran into a monster. I saw one in the Eastern forest, too.

name: Cain
line: The Eastern forest? Do you mean Sherwood Forest?

name: Shino
line: Yeah. I ran into a wyvern. It was a tough opponent.

name: Arthur
line: ......I need to report this to the ministers...... Sorry, I’ll have to return to the castle for a bit.

name: Cain
line: Understood. Shall we postpone the parade and the inauguration ceremony?

name: Arthur
line: No, we’ll hold them as planned. We need to offer the people hope after the suffering they went through under the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Shino
line: A parade and a party? Do I get anything for participating? Can I become someone of status, like the Master of Blanchett?

name: Arthur
line: You can become a hero. Everyone will look forward to witnessing your great deeds.

name: Cain
line: You’re an interesting one. Eastern wizards are supposed to hate humans and attention.

name: Akira
line: (It’s probably better if I don’t tell him about seeing Oz at that last moment...... I might be wrong, and I don’t want him to worry.)

name: Central Country woman
line: I hear that the Sage and the wizards are coming to the capital!

name: Central Country man
line: It’s the parade they hold every year after they’ve held off the attacks of the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Cain
line: Oz and the Northern wizards are still missing, but we should follow Arthur’s lead and head over to the Central capital. Everyone should get ready to travel.....

name: Chloe
line: Sir Sage! Sir Sage! I have a guest for you!

name: Envoy
line: I-I’m an envoy from the capital, with a message from Prince Arthur
column3: preparations for the parade are still underway, so he would like you to wait here for a while longer.

name: Cain
line: I see. The capital must be in disarray, after all.

name: Envoy
line: Tomorrow, or the day after.... We will send another envoy your way when preparations are complete. Until then, do relax and spend the time as you please.

name: Akira
line: A parade and a party, huh.... I’ve only ever been to a relative’s wedding party — what am I going to do about etiquette....?

name: Chloe
line: Sir Sage, can I come on in?

name: Chloe
line: Excuse me. Can I ask a question?

name: Chloe
line: Arthur mentioned stuff like a parade and a party and a ceremony, but do we get to participate in all that too?

name: Akira
line: Yes. They’ll all be held in Central Country.

name: Chloe
line: I've always wanted to go to a party! I've made clothes for parties before, but I've never actually been to one!

name: Akira
line: Seeing you this delighted makes me happy too.

name: Chloe
line: Of course I’m happy — it’s a party! Don’t you like parties, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: I’ve never really been to one, you see.....

name: Chloe
line: Then we’re the same! I’ll make you an awesome outfit, Sir Sage. I’m making one for Rustica too.

name: Akira
line: So you and Rustica are pretty close, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Hmm, yeah. I guess so? I hope that’s the case, but Rustica is a bit quirky, so.....

name: Chloe
line: They'll spin from looking around at all the people, they’ll spin from all the twirling you do as you dance, and they’ll spin when you’ve had too much wine, too.

name: Chloe
line: You laughed! I’m glad. Sir Sage, you said you came here from another world all alone, right?

name: Akira
line: Thank you very much, Chloe. Let’s all enjoy the party together.

name: Chloe
line: Ah, Rustica’s calling for me. I bet he lost something again. I have to go.

name: Akira
line: The bread is delicious.... Nero, did you bake this?

name: Akira
line: It’s so good! The wheat flavor is delicious, and the outer layer is crisp, but it’s perfectly soft underneath....

name: Akira
line: Bradley would be delighted. I hear he loves delicious food.

name: Akira
line: I’m sorry.... We can discuss living arrangements later, but I still want you to take part in the party and the parade.

name: Nero
line: A party and a parade..... Do I really have to go?

name: Akira
line: But you ran a restaurant — you must be used to dealing with people?

name: Nero
line: I presented myself as a human when I ran my shop. Only wizards or severe weirdos would visit a wizard’s restaurant.

name: Nero
line: I get that you and Arthur are working hard for the sake of wizards, but.....

name: Riquet
line: So you never intend on using your God-granted powers for the sake of others? You’re just going to selfishly live an easy life?

name: Nero
line: Haha.... Those are some harsh words first thing in the morning. Good morning, little guy from Central. What do you want for breakfast?

name: Nero
line: What? I’d never feed you any rotten crap. Are you saying I don’t keep the kitchen clean?

name: Riquet
line: No, that’s not..... I can only eat holy beans, holy milk, holy eggs, and fruit.

name: Nero
line: What are you talking about.... Can you draw me a picture?

name: Riquet
line: ......Red things, like this..... Yellow things, like this......

name: Nero
line: Okay, so a banana and an apple. You’re a kid, so you need to get more nutrients. How about carbs? Can you eat bread?

name: Nero
line: Here, thanks for waiting. The bread is fresh out of the oven, so it’s still warm.

name: Nero
line: Huh? What kind of life have you been living? Were you being bullied?

name: Riquet
line: No. They took good care of me.

name: Nero
line: I see. But if I cared about someone, I’d never offer them a cold meal.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, eat up. In any case, I refuse to attend the party or the parade......

name: Nero
line: Hm? Haha, right? Doesn’t it taste great?

name: Riquet
line: It feels like my mouth is in heaven..... It’s truly delicious. Thank you so much, Nero.

name: Riquet
line: ....This is good too! I didn’t realize the outside world had such delicious food.....

name: Nero
line: Temptation? What are you talking about?

name: Riquet
line: Father Priest told me that the outside world is corrupted and full of temptation — that’s why both humans and wizards have fallen.

name: Nero
line: Who is this father priest? Is he a wizard?

name: Riquet
line: No. He’s human, but he was chosen by God — he can hear His voice.

name: Nero
line: ............. ...Humans are even using kids now, huh.....

name: Nero
line: You seem younger than that..... Must be because you were locked away all this time....

name: Riquet
line: I wasn’t locked away. They were simply protecting me from the corruption of the outside world. They’re all very kind people.

name: Nero
line: ......Got it. Feel free to eat as much as you want. There’s plenty to go around for seconds, too.

name: Mitile
line: Ah... Hello Sir Sage. Mister Nero, too — breakfast was delicious!

name: Mitile
line: Riquet, when you’re finished eating, let’s head to the courtyard together. My brother will be teaching lessons!

name: Riquet
line: Rutile will? Am I allowed to join you?

name: Mitile
line: Of course! We’re friends now, Riquet.

name: Riquet
line: Friends..... Got it. I’ll join you then.

name: Mitile
line: Ah.... Sir Sage, Mister Nero, would you like to join us too?

name: Akira
line: I’ll drop by to see how things are going later.

name: Rutile
line: All right now, Mitile, Riquet. I’m going to teach you two some new words today.

name: Rutile
line: Riquet, how well can you write?

name: Mitile
line: Don’t you know how to read and write?

name: Riquet
line: It wasn’t part of my job.... Does everyone here know how to write?

name: Rutile
line: Then let’s start by learning how to write your name, Riquet.

name: Rutile
line: That’s great. "Riquet." This is how you spell your name.

name: Rutile
line: Well done! Next, Mitile, could you write your name? Make it look extra nice, so that Riquet can read it.

name: Mitile
line: Got it! Watch me, Riquet. "Mitile"...... This is my name.

name: Riquet
line: M-i-t-i-l-e. Mitile. Got it! I’ll try writing it out.

name: Rutile
line: Excellent job, you two. Both humans and wizards use words to express their thoughts and feelings to others, right?

name: Riquet
line: I would like to use words of blessing. Because I want to bless others and make them happy. This includes you two as well.

name: Rutile
line: Thank you. That already makes me happy; you’re a kind, good boy, Riquet.

name: Nero
line: I’ll do the party and the parade.

name: Nero
line: Just this once. None of it is taking place in Eastern Country, so....

name: Nero
line: No need to thank me. It’s basically just a free meal and drinks, after all.

name: Akira
line: I’d like them to come, but..... They probably won’t show up unless someone stronger than them — like Oz — commands them to.....

name: Nero
line: Yeah, that makes sense. ....It’s for the better.....

name: Akira
line: I was listening to your lesson from a distance. Please let me join in next time. I’d love to learn about the world with everyone else.

name: Rutile
line: Giving the Sage a lesson — the prospect makes me nervous, but I’d love to have you!

name: Akira
line: Rutile, both you and your brother Mitile are wizards, right? Were your parents wizards too?

name: Rutile
line: Our father was human, but our mother was a witch. She was known as the great witch Tiretta, and she was apparently quite famous.

name: Akira
line: I see.... Rutile, you must be a kind person because she was a wonderful mother.

name: Rutile
line: Thank you. Mother was an important person in my life, but it’s also thanks to one of her friends.

name: Rutile
line: Yes. I met him when Mitile was still in Mother’s tummy. I was a child at the time, but he still seemed like such a cool man.

name: I fell into shock, and almost started crying. But her friend showed me an incredible spell
line: it was so powerful that he blew away an entire mountain in an instant.

name: Akira
line: A whole mountain in an instant.... I didn’t realize magic could be so powerful.....

name: Rutile
line: Yes. After that, the cool uncle gave me a weird talisman and promised me this
column3: "I will protect you and your brother."

name: Rutile
line: Those words really heartened me. Because I knew that I wouldn’t be alone, even after Mother died.

name: Akira
line: He sounds like a wonderful person. It reminds me of the story of Daddy Long Legs1 from my world.....

name: Rutile
line: Long legs? Now that you mention it, he did have long legs! Mother introduced him to us as an uncle, but he actually looked a bit younger than that.

name: Akira
line: No, thank you for telling me all this. I hope you get to meet your Daddy Long Legs one day.

name: Central Country man
line: Today’s the day of the Sage’s wizards’ parade! We’ll get to see the heroes who defeated the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Central Country woman
line: The wizards sure are taking their time......

name: Central Country man
line: Even if you call them heroes, wizards are just liars who only act according to their whims. Are you sure they didn’t just ditch?

name: Central Country woman
line: No way...... But we put so much effort into preparing for their welcome on top of carrying out the restoration work.......

name: Central Country man
line: They must have been this irresponsible when fighting against the < Great Catastrophe > too...... That’s why we’ve suffered such great damages......

name: Arthur
line: We were supposed to meet up at the outskirts of town and head to the parade together. I explained all this to Cain.

name: Cock Robin
line: Y-you can’t! Prince Arthur, if you’re gone too—....

name: Arthur
line: Then could you go check on them for me, Cock Robin?

name: Cock Robin
line: I understand. If I hurry by carriage, I’ll be there in half a day —

name: Arthur

line: Aside from Prince Arthur, the knight Cain, and the noble from Blanchett, the wizards are a bunch of rogues.

name: That is to say
line: did the threat of the < Great Catastrophe > actually grow stronger, or was it mere negligence on the wizards’ part?

name: Arthur
line: Did you say negligence......? You’re overstepping, Nicholas. Do not forget that they lost their very own comrades.

name: Nicholas
line: Well, with all due respect, Prince Arthur.

name: Arthur
line: How preposterous...... Why would they be killing each other on the eve of the battle with the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Nicholas
line: There’s no evidence to disprove the possibility. The battle between the < Great Catastrophe > and the Sage’s wizards is kept a close secret, after all.

name: Shylock
line: ...... Thank goodness Faust isn’t here right now.

name: Murr
line: You’re right! That guy would’ve been cursed to death!

name: Cain
line: If Prince Arthur weren’t there, I’d have slugged him myself.

name: Snow
line: Oh my. The Eastern wizards, the Western wizards, and the Central wizards are all so scary......

name: White
line: That’s right. Us Northern wizards are the only gentle ones around here......

name: Heathcliff
line: Please, I don’t quite see how the Northern wizards could be described as gentle. You must be talking about the Southern wizards. See, like Mister Rutile......

name: Rutile
line: What do you mean by that!?

name: Shylock
line: I’m afraid there’s no such thing as a gentle wizard.

name: Murr
line: You’re right! North, South, East, West, Central — we all love to fight!

name: Cain
line: I always thought the little brother seemed pretty strong-willed, but I guess that goes for the older one too.

name: Snow
line: Well, he is the son of the great witch Tiretta.

name: White
line: Tiretta was a woman with a temper. You really can’t fight your bloodline.

name: Nicholas
line: You insolent fool. Give me your name.

name: Rutile
line: I am the Southern wizard, Rutile.

name: Nicholas
line: Yes, exactly. They failed to prevent the < Great Catastrophe > from drawing close, causing an unforeseen level of disastrous damage.

name: Rutile
line: Then what are you? You, who did not even fight the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Nicholas
line: You insolent wizard....... You think you can get away with such arrogance simply because you can use magic? I’ll show you!

name: Arthur
line: Stop it, Nicholas! The Southern wizards all died in the last battle. There were people he knew among them!

name: Nicholas
line: Prince Arthur! Do you mean to side with these wizards over me, when my military family has served the crown for generations?

name: Arthur
line: I am not siding with anyone! I am assessing the situation from an objective standpoint....

name: Vincent
line: Do not blame him, Nicholas. Arthur is still young. Of course he would side with the wizards.

name: Vincent
line: Is that so? Then you truly are a wizard. A normal human would despise his parents if they abandoned him.

name: Arthur
line: ...... Why do you refuse to listen to anything we have to say!?

name: Nicholas
line: Please stop acting like you’re the victim here
column3: you are the ones who possess such terrifying power.

name: Arthur
line: We are all trying to be helpful! That goes for myself, and everyone here in this room......

name: Nicholas
line: That might be true for you, Prince Arthur, but it does not mean that the other wizards feel the same way.

name: Nicholas
line: They do not care about the people suffering in this world. That is why they have turned their backs on their roles, and brought about so many casualties.

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama......! What should we do, Dr. Figaro.......

name: Figaro
line: Oh boy...... Don’t kill them, Lennox.

name: Snow
line: This won’t do! You mustn’t lay a finger on the humans!

name: White
line: We’ll end up fighting the humans before we fight the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Central Country man
line: It can’t be...... Did the < Great Catastrophe > approach again......

name: Rustica
line: Oh no. Are you all right, my lady?

name: Drummond
line: M-Mithra of the North......! He’s savage and brutal, and his magical power is second only to Oz’s......!

name: Central Country nobleman
line: Eek......! The Northern wizards are going to kill us all......!

name: Snow
line: Shylock, Murr. If Mithra starts a rampage, do you think you could stop him?

name: White
line: Thank you for your immediate response.

name: Cain
line: Should we get Faust? But I guess he might just side with Mithra....

name: Figaro
line: No, he's actually quite a softie, so I don't think he'll harm any innocent civilians....

name: Shino
line: Sounds like fun. I'll take him on.

name: Heathcliff
line: Don’t be an idiot! Stand back!

name: Shino
line: Did you just call me an idiot?

name: Heathcliff
line: ....You can only be so bold because you don't actually know Mithra.....

name: Heathcliff
line: ....What should we do.... Sir Oz is the only one who can defeat him......

name: Owen
line: How rude. Is nobody going to welcome me?

name: Cain
line: So you're the only person I can see..... This is some cruel irony.

name: Owen
line: Fufu... What are you talking about?

name: Bradley
line: Just when I thought I could finally kick back and get away from it all... I had to get dragged back into this fucking mess.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, Nero. It sure has been a while.

name: Nero
line: ......This has nothing to do with you.

name: Murr
line: Alright then, let the party go on!

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz! Thank you very much!

name: Oz
line: There is no reason for you to thank me.

name: Arthur
line: ...Ah.... Yes, I am aware. But you made everyone so happy.

name: Akira
line: (He has such a polite manner that I can’t really see what makes him a "beast," but......)

name: Akira
line: (......He has such a pretty face, but......)

name: Snow
line: Glad you came, Mithra. I was worried that the gates of hell would burst open.

name: Mithra
line: Oz dragged me here by force......

name: Mithra
line: I really will kill him one day.

name: White
line: Now, now. Thanks to him, you get to eat this delicious food.

name: Mithra
line: It’s all the same once it ends up in your stomach.

name: Snow
line: Oh, that's right. Let me introduce the sage.

name: Akira
line: Ah...... I’m the Sage, Akira. Nice to meet you.

name: Mithra
line: By the way, why was I called here? Are you sure I don’t have to defeat anything or kill anyone?

name: Snow
line: You certainly are hot-blooded. The Sage will assign you a role — try asking him.

name: Akira
line: Um... For today, please have an enjoyable night with the other wizards and the people of Central.

name: Mithra
line: Oh, most certainly. Oz should have just said that from the start.

name: Akira
line: Wh...... What did Oz tell you?

name: Mithra
line: He said, "Obey me." Naturally, we ended up trying to kill each other. He really infuriates me.

name: Akira
line: Um, you’ll get grease in your hair if you do that, so I think you should wipe your hands first.

name: Akira
line: I... I mean, if you're okay with it...

name: Mithra
line: Okay... I'll try using it, then.

name: Snow
line: I never thought I would witness Mithra wiping his mouth with a napkin....

name: White
line: You really do live to see all sorts of wonders....

name: Mithra
line: Well then, I'll take a walk around. I just have to be nice to the people who speak to me, right?

name: Snow
line: I don't think anyone will try to speak to you... You should try speaking to them instead.

name: Mithra
line: I understand. Humans certainly take it into their minds to do foolish things.

name: Snow
line: We’re a little worried, so we’ll go follow him.

name: White
line: Sage, take your time and enjoy yourself too.

name: Akira
line: Owen...... We were inside just a moment ago.....

name: Owen
line: I have no friends, so I wanted you to speak to me. Sir Sage.

name: Owen
line: That look on your face... It’s fine. I’m used to it. Was I a bother? I’ll send you back inside.

name: Akira
line: Ah... I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to.....

name: Akira
line: Let’s talk, Owen. I wanted to speak with you too.

name: Akira
line: Um.... I’d love to know what kind of person you are, Owen.

name: Owen
line: I want to talk about myself too. But I don’t know much about myself.

name: Owen
line: But I do know about you — you, the Sage who is all alone.

name: Owen
line: When you think about yourself, don't you get extremely....

name: Owen
line: Why are you running away? I'm talking about you.

name: Owen
line: What is it? Can’t you see we’re busy talking?

name: Owen
line: Oh? But you were the one who brought me here?

name: Owen
line: No use pretending you're a good boy, Oz.

name: Oz
line: Do you want me to kill you again, Owen?

name: Oz
line: Do not worry. He's probably somewhere near.

name: Akira
line: ......What did you mean when you said, "want me to kill you again"......?

name: Oz
line: Owen has hidden his soul. That is why, no matter how many times he dies, he will always come back to life. What did you talk about with Owen?

name: Oz
line: Do not listen to Owen's words. They will eat away at your soul.

name: Akira
line: No...... He simply asked me about myself.

name: Oz
line: That is the curse. To speak of yourself to someone you have not opened your heart to — anyone would find that a painful burden to bear.

name: Oz
line: Do not forget your name. The greater your duty, the more easily you come to forget your name.

name: Oz
line: But you still have your own name. Do not forget it, and do not let anyone else forget it.

name: Akira
line: ......Are you also thinking about Arthur, who is a wizard, and the Prince of Central?

name: Akira
line: You were the one who raised Arthur, right?

name: Oz
line: That child possessed powerful magic. I simply picked him up to gather his stone.

name: Oz
line: That's right. And now he has returned to his parents. ......That is all there is to it.

name: Oz
line: Do not concern yourself with others. Take care that you do not forget my warning.

name: Oz
line: There is no reason for you to thank me.

name: Vincent
line: Sir Sage, Oz. So this is where you were.

name: Vincent
line: I apologize for Nicholas’ behavior earlier. I have a favor I’d like to ask of you two.

name: Vincent
line: Look to the north. There’s a collapsed tower.

name: Akira
line: Ah....... That’s the huge tower I saw when I arrived in this world......

name: Vincent
line: The tower is a symbol of Central Country, but it collapsed in an earthquake this morning.

name: Vincent
line: It seems to have been a highly localized earthquake. There were no other damages, except for the tower and the gate nearby, which has been all but destroyed.

name: Akira
line: Oz...... I’m asking this of you as well. Could you please repair the tower?

name: Vincent
line: You have my thanks. Well then, I’ll show you to the tower tomorrow......

name: Oz
line: I can do it from here.

name: Vincent
line: Right here...? You mean you're going to repair it right now...?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz... Sir Oz, are you going to repair the Central tower for us?

name: Oz
line: Do not speak with food in your mouth.

name: Mithra
line: This thing is really hard, you know?

name: Arthur
line: Mithra. You don't have to eat the shells. Please spit them out.

name: Mithra
line: Why? Do you want them? If you do, then it makes me want to eat them all the more.

name: Arthur
line: Is that so......? I hope scallop shells aren’t bad for your teeth......

name: Mithra
line: They’re tasting more and more like biscuits.

name: Akira
line: P-please don't fall asleep! Plea...... He's really heavy!

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, Sir Oz! Please pull yourself together!

name: Oz
line: I didn’t realize you were here. No matter.

name: Mithra
line: Ahahaha! I'll push him off the balcony while I can!

name: Arthur
line: Don't be so rude! Sir Oz, Sir Oz! Are you all right?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, you said that just......

name: Oz
line: Well, no matter. I’ll get this done in a second.

name: Mithra
line: Ahahaha! This is the third time!

name: Arthur
line: ......Don't laugh at Sir Oz! There must be a reason for this!

name: Akira
line: It might be his injury from the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz...... This is the Central castle. You were asked to repair the Central tower with magic, but......

name: Mithra
line: That's right. You nearly killed me.

name: Owen
line: Maybe he can't use it at night?

name: Oz
line: Owen, what is that portrait you’re carrying? ...... Is that Snow and White......?

name: Owen
line: These two got trapped inside a frame the moment the sun went down.

name: White in the portrait
line: You must treat us with care.

name: Owen
line: Can I throw you off the balcony to see if you can fly while you're stuck in the frame?

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: No no no no no no no!

name: Oz
line: I can sense their magic. They should be fine.

name: Owen
line: You should cast away Oz just like that.

name: Owen
line: You can beat Oz for sure right now. If you kill him, you won’t have to obey him anymore.

name: Mithra
line: There’s no way I could lose to you if you can’t use magic. I never thought the < Great Catastrophe > would leave me such a blessing......

name: Mithra
line: Oz. I'm going to pay you back for all these years.

name: Arthur
line: I won't let you lay a finger on Sir Oz. If you intend to fight, I will be your opponent.

name: Oz
line: You do not stand a chance against him!

name: Arthur
line: I...... I will protect you, Sir Oz. Just as you protected me from avalanches and wolves when I was little!

name: Chapter 14
line: A Collapsed Tower and the Shadow of a Bird

name: Akira
line: Mithra, please wait! If we lose any of the chosen wizards, we might not be able to defeat the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Mithra
line: But wouldn't it be a problem for you too, Owen? If the world ends, then we die too.

name: Owen
line: Well, true..... Okay, but it's still a good opportunity, so why don't you take an arm or a leg?

name: Mithra
line: I don't make a hobby of collecting body parts like you do.

name: Owen
line: I don't either. I just happened to like this eye. But I’d want Oz's arm.

name: Arthur
line: What are you going to do with Sir Oz's arm!?

name: Owen
line: I'll use it to scratch my back.

name: Owen
line: And I'll make it pet my head.

name: Arthur
line: You should just ask him right now! Sir Oz will pat your head. He did many times when I was little......

name: Oz
line: Arthur...... Arthur. That's enough. Keep quiet.

name: Figaro
line: Huh? Oz, did you call me?

name: Oz
line: ......Yaaawn...... It looks like I can manage simple magic.... But I am...... sleepy.....

name: Figaro
line: Hey now, don't call someone over just to yawn in their face.

name: Oz
line: I've temporarily lost my magic. Protect Arthur from Mithra and Owen.

name: Akira
line: ...."You can handle them, right, Figaro"....? Weren't the Southern wizards supposed to be weak....?

name: Oz
line: Figaro is a Northern wizard. He's lived longer than me.

name: Figaro
line: Can you stop getting in the way of my laid-back lifestyle all the time?

name: Figaro
line: I’m talking about my peaceful, quiet life. That’s how the previous sage described it.

name: Oz
line: An old guy with a naughty streak?

name: Figaro
line: Rutile and Mitile don't know of my past. They tell me, "Dr. Figaro, you’re no good at anything." Isn't that lovely?

name: Arthur
line: But Sir Figaro, you're good at everything!

name: Figaro
line: Thanks, Arthur. You're as cute as always. Even though you were raised by such an obstinate guy.

name: Figaro
line: Man, Sir Sage found out too. I tried to come onto him like a simple, helpless young man....

name: Akira
line: Um, you didn’t seem simple or helpless at all..... You were pretty overwhelming, and I was honestly scared.....

name: Figaro
line: No way? Looks like I need to study harder. I wasn’t trying to scare you — sorry.

name: Figaro
line: Anyway, this had better be the last time you ask me to do this sort of thing. ...You want me to handle Mithra and Owen, right?

name: Mithra
line: Oh, I don’t like this man at all.

name: Figaro
line: And I don’t want to do this either. You and Owen are both so strong, and I’m getting pretty old.....

name: Arthur
line: But Sir Figaro, you’re always so youthful!

name: Figaro
line: Thank you, Arthur. I guess Sir Figaro will do his best for you, then.

name: Rutile
line: It’s full of chestnuts — your favorite! Let’s eat together.

name: Figaro
line: Oh yay~! I’ll totally have some!

name: Oz
line: ......Do you ever question your way of life?

name: Figaro
line: Shut up. ....Anyway, looks like I can't help you. Sorry.

name: Oz
line: ....You're going to leave me for chestnuts?

name: Figaro
line: I can steal chestnuts from a merchant at any time. I’m leaving for them, because I want to reciprocate their sincerity with equal goodness. I'm a kind man, after all.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro, were you still speaking to Sir Sage and the others?

name: Figaro
line: Oh, no worries. We’re all done—.

name: Rutile
line: Would everyone else like some cake too? I’ll bring you slices if you’d like.

name: Akira
line: Woah....! You surprised me, suddenly appearing behind my back......

name: Rutile
line: Then I’ll bring you some. How about you, Sir Oz, Prince Arthur, and Mister Mithra?

name: Mithra
line: I’ll eat anything but scallop shells.

name: Arthur
line: See? They weren’t good after all.

name: Mithra
line: But I ate something with a similar shape once — it was soft and sweet and delicious. Perhaps the flavor changes with the harvesting season.

name: Arthur
line: Ah, that must’ve been a madeline. I’ll ask the maids to bring you some.

name: Owen
line: I’ll eat lots of cakes. Can you pile them up onto a big plate?

name: Rutile
line: Got it. I see you really like sweets.

name: Mitile
line: What’s your favorite kind of cake? I’ll bring it to you if they have it.

name: Owen
line: It's made of utterly crushed up red fruits, loaded with piles of sugar, and simmered down until it’s like an open wound that's just recovering.

name: Mitile
line: Huh. Oh, I see it now. I’ll bring you some.

name: Owen
line: I like cream too. The slimy, fluffy stuff that sticks all over your hands. I’d compare it to....

name: Mitile
line: Y-you don’t have to compare it to anything. I’m good.

name: Owen
line: I want to stuff my mouth completely full with it. So it’ll spill out of the corners of my lips when I close them.

name: Mitile
line: Plus what....? What are you looking at — Mister Mithra?

name: Rutile
line: ....He might be Mother’s friend.... I’ll ask him later.

name: Mithra
line: It's warm here, even at night. Good thing I didn't bring a jacket.

name: Owen
line: I like the stuff that's drenched in sweet rum, too. Wonder what that's called.

name: Akira
line: (These two....... They’re scary, but they can also be really easygoing......)

name: Bradley
line: Tch... I finally got my hands on some good food. Don't get in my way like that.

name: Bradley
line: Well, I am. Even when they let me out of prison, Snow and White wouldn’t take their eyes off me in the magical headquarters; I never got a chance to escape.

name: Bradley
line: I sneezed and got blasted far away.

name: Bradley
line: Listen, it sounds stupid as hell, but it's true! Every time I sneeze, I get blasted away.

name: Nero
line: Seriously? What are you gonna do when you catch a cold?

name: Bradley
line: Well, I guess I'd be stuck taking a tour around the world. Tch.... What the hell’s going on.....? And I ended up getting dragged back by Oz anyway.

name: Bradley
line: How about you, Nero? Our gang fell apart before I knew it. I thought you'd keep the guys together.

name: Nero
line: I went clean. I won't tag along with your bullshit jobs.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, don't be like that. Let's work together again. We’ll get outta here and stir up a real storm.

name: Nero
line: I’m making an honest living now. Don't drag me into this.

name: Bradley
line: An honest living? What are you doing?

name: Nero
line: ......I run a restaurant in the East.

name: Bradley
line: .......Well, I guess that's not a bad idea... Your food was real good, after all.

name: Nero
line: You said you'd kill me if I left the gang.

name: Bradley
line: What's the point in killing a restaurant owner? Plus, I got caught, and now they’ve even got me working as a Sage's wizard.

name: Bradley
line: But there is one thing I want to ask you.

name: Bradley
line: Where were you on the night I was captured? If you had been there, I never would've been caught.

name: Bradley
line: I'm not here to blame you or anything. But I always wanted to know what happened to you.

name: Bradley
line: Ahaha! Hey, what's wrong? Don't look so serious!

name: Bradley
line: ......!? Ow......!? This thing came crashing down on my head!

name: White in the portrait
line: We didn't want to come crashing down on your head either!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Owen threw us off the balcony! Go complain to Owen instead!

name: Bradley
line: Tch...... That guy’s creepy as hell. I'm gonna kill him one day.....

name: Nero
line: Right, you guys get stuck in this frame because of your bizarre injury....

name: White in the portrait
line: Look at the sky, Nero, Bradley!

name: Nero
line: .....? What are those things....? ......Wizards with wings....?

name: Snow in the portrait
line: They're the Magical Technology Corps of Central Country.

name: White in the portrait
line: Those who use machines fueled by mana stones to generate magic.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Now let's see what they plan to do with the collapsed Central tower....

name: Arthur
line: That’s our country's Magical Technology Corps....

name: Vincent
line: I wanted the Sage’s wizards to perform the deed for us, but instead of a miracle, you staged us a comedy.

name: Vincent
line: Let me show you the power of our Magical Technology Corps.

name: Central Country man
line: No...... Isn’t that the Magical Technology Corps? I hear they obtained the technology from Western Country.

name: Central Country man
line: What are they doing...? Maybe they're going to fix the Central tower for us?

name: Central Country man
line: That would be great...... It feels awful seeing the tower collapsed like that.

name: Nicholas
line: The scene is even more disastrous than I expected...... I have to...... No, I will definitely fix this.

name: Central Country man
line: It's the head of the Magical Technology Corps, Lord Nicholas!

name: Nicholas
line: We cannot repair the Central tower itself, but the power of the Magical Technology Corps is more than enough to repair the gates surrounding the tower.

name: Central Country man
line: I’m amazed — is this really just technology? We have no need for wizards anymore!

name: Central Country woman
line: Ahaha, don't say that! The wizards just went through all that trouble to hold a fancy parade and all, too!

name: Mitile
line: So that's...... The power of the Magical Technology Corps......

name: Rutile
line: Who knows...... I have no idea......

name: Shylock
line: It is absolutely chilling. There is no way to resist pleasure that comes without pain.

name: Murr
line: What are you looking at? Something fun? Something amazing?

name: Shylock
line: It may be fun and amazing to you.

name: Shylock
line: Indeed. The previous Murr was the one who invented the magical science technique fueled by mana stones.

name: Murr
line: I don't get what you’re talking about!

name: Shylock
line: Of course you wouldn't. That's why I hated you.

name: Vincent
line: Everything is proceeding as planned. It looks like there’s nothing for the wizards to do here.

name: Arthur
line: ......Uncle, surely you didn’t have to phrase it that way.......

name: Figaro
line: .....The Magical Technology Corps, huh. If that stuff spreads, we're going to be in trouble.

name: Figaro
line: At this rate, they'll start hunting wizards.

name: Figaro
line: I'll give you the details later. I can't explain anything here.

name: Heathcliff
line: I wonder what they’re doing... I'll go check.

name: Young Maid
line: ....It’s pointless. It's going to collapse again anyway.....

name: Young Maid
line: The tower wasn’t destroyed by an earthquake.....

name: Shino
line: Don't worry. I won't eat you or anything — I'm already full from that delicious pie.

name: Young Maid
line: My mother baked it..... She works in the kitchen, you see.

name: Shino
line: Your mom is a genius. Please tell her that.

name: Young Maid
line: Yes... Fufu, she'll be glad to hear that.

name: Shino
line: So what was that about the tower?

name: Young Maid
line: The tower wasn’t destroyed by an earthquake. There was no earthquake.

name: Heathcliff
line: The shadow of a bird? Are you sure she didn't mistake it for the shadow of a cloud?

name: Shino
line: I asked a bunch of people, but they all said they didn’t sense an earthquake. Something else must've caused the tower to collapse.

name: Shino
line: I'm going to check out the cemetery.

name: Shino
line: Yeah. You're all staying the night here, right? I'll be back by morning.

name: Akira
line: It looks like everyone’s rooms are ready. Oh, Heath, Shino, is something the matter?

name: Shino
line: I'm going to find out what monster brought that tower down.

name: Akira
line: A monster...? So it really wasn't an earthquake.....

name: Heathcliff
line: You thought it was weird too, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: There were lots of earthquakes back in my world, so.... Normally, when there's a tremor strong enough to bring a tower down, the surrounding regions also shake quite a bit.

name: Shino
line: The maid told me that the shadow of a bird crawled out of the cemetery and latched itself onto the tower.

name: Akira
line: If it's an ancient creature, maybe Snow and White would know something about it....

name: Shino
line: Please ask them about it. I'm headed off.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....... It's dangerous. I'll go with you.

name: Shino
