line: Heath? Headed to a cemetery? In the middle of the night? Did you forget that you’re afraid of ghosts despite being a wizard?

name: Akira
line: I’m worried about just the two of you going alone. I’ll come along too.

name: Heathcliff
line: But Sir Sage, it's even more dangerous for you.

name: Shino
line: You're not going to be of any help.

name: Shino
line: It's dangerous, Sir Sage. Please get a good night's rest in bed.

name: Akira
line: Then you should at least take someone else with you.....

name: Faust
line: Why haven’t you headed to your rooms? The party should already be over.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, it ended while you were napping.

name: Faust
line: I missed my meal, you see. I'm about to have a late evening drink with the wine that Nero snagged.

name: Nero
line: You’re supposed to enjoy a late night drink all alone.

name: Akira
line: I see the Eastern wizards really love being alone......

name: Shino
line: It's fine. Heath and I will just go together.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, wait up! .....Ah, Sir Sage, Mr. Faust, Nero. Good night.

name: Nero
line: Central Country might be a pretty safe place, but you two are still a bit too young for adventures after dark.

name: Faust
line: Oh, please.... How did I get dragged into this mess......

name: Nero
line: You're the one who said, "It's dangerous for two children to be headed out alone," even before Mister Sage could say it.

name: Faust
line: And you’re tagging along with us, so that goes for you too.

name: Nero
line: You didn't have to come along, you know. If something happens to you, the higher-ups are going to yell at us.

name: Nero
line: Like Oz, or Snow and White?

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry... I wanted to take a look at the world outside of the castle.

name: Faust
line: There’s little to see here; isn’t it a boring sight? Hardly anyone walks through the streets at night.

name: Faust
line: That's right. We fear the < Great Catastrophe >; yet we must rely on its light.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, don't go ahead on your own!

name: Faust
line: Don't raise your voice, Heath. You will awaken the dead.

name: Nero
line: What, are you scared? Did you kill the guys sleeping underneath these grounds?

name: Nero
line: Then there's no need to be afraid.

name: Shino
line: Isn't that hill also part of the cemetery?

name: Shino
line: What sort of criminals? Like bandits?

name: Nero
line: I guess so..... At least they get a proper burial.

name: Faust
line: Bandits, murderers, and.... Those who failed to embody the justice defined by their times.

name: Shino
line: Those who failed to embody justice.... You mean failed heroes became criminals?

name: Rutile
line: Mister Lennox, are you having trouble falling asleep?

name: Rutile
line: Memories...? Have you been to this castle before?

name: Lennox
line: "Let's go. Follow me. Don't leave my side."

name: Akira
line: The cemetery is scary at night.....

name: Shino
line: The scariest thing about a midnight cemetery isn't ghosts; it’s graverobbers. They'll dig up and sell anything they can find. And if they spot you, they’ll bury you alive.

name: Shino
line: Yeah. I thought he was a man-eating demon when I saw him.

name: Faust
line: .....This cemetery might've been visited by some graverobbers too.

name: Faust
line: The whole place has been ravaged.

name: Nero
line: You're right.... You can see where they dug things up.

name: Heathcliff
line: How could they do something so awful...? When we’re all suffering from the < Great Catastrophe > already....

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino! Don't just jump into the grave!

name: Shino
line: Look at this. They haven't touched any of the valuables. The pearls and money are still here.

name: Faust
line: Is there a corpse inside the coffin?

name: Nero
line: That thing must be heavy. I'll help.

name: Heathcliff
line: You're going to open the coffin!? But someone who passed away is resting in there....

name: Faust
line: You're right, Heath. The dead deserve an apology; I'll offer them a prayer.

name: Faust
line: As wizards, we harness mysterious powers derived from sources such as our hearts and natural surroundings. The < Great Catastrophe > is one such source.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....You're saying that someone performed a ritual by borrowing the power of the < Great Catastrophe >....?

name: Nero
line: There isn't a single bone in this coffin. I’ll bet the other graves are the same, too.

name: Shino
line: Don't force yourself. You don't need to touch a single coffin. Just stick to Sir Sage.

name: Nero
line: ....I don't like the feeling of this wind....

name: Faust
line: Peace, wandering souls. May you find solace in the quiet of night.

name: Shino
line: Faust. I checked a bunch of coffins, but they were all empty.

name: Nero
line: Same here. What do I do with these burial treasures?

name: Nero
line: There's a ton of valuable stuff rolling around here, and the owners have headed off to heaven. No reason not to take it, right?

name: Nero
line: Hey, it's a joke, come on.

name: Heathcliff
line: They’re going to curse you, Nero!

name: Shino
line: I think Nero is right. I'd rather people give gold to a starving child than leave it to rot with the dead.

name: Heathcliff
line: These are precious items filled with memories belonging to the dead. They should stay with them, even after they pass away.

name: Faust
line: Nero. Jump in place, right now.

name: Shino
line: Hey, look over there. Wasn’t it that collar on the ground?

name: Faust
line: Shino, wait. Don't get close to that thing.

name: Faust
line: ....It wasn't there just a moment ago.

name: Shino
line: This happened back in Sherwood Forest too. The amount of power coming from that thing is just creepy.

name: Faust
line: It must be because the < Great Catastrophe > got too close to this world.

name: Akira
line: Nero! Yes I am, thank you!

name: Nero
line: You're welcome. The higher ups will yell at me if anything happens to you, after all.

name: Shino
line: Leave it to me. I'll handle it.

name: Shino
line: And we're done. If you were a tamer collar, I'd have offered you as a gift to Mistress.

name: Heathcliff
line: You're as reckless as ever, Shino......

name: Shino
line: Hey, can you praise me before you start complaining? A vassal loves and lives to be praised by his lord, you know.

name: Heathcliff
line: Where do you learn these sorts of phrases?

name: Shino
line: That’s a secret. Hey Faust, you should praise me too. You're a teacher, right?

name: Faust
line: Well done. But you failed to finish the job.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey. Don't click your tongue. You need to say thank you to Mr. Faust.

name: Faust
line: .....Get lost. No matter how deep your resentment, no matter how furious your rage....

name: Faust
line: I'm a shut-in. I don't particularly enjoy solving mysteries. Ask the other wizards to figure it out.

name: Heathcliff
line: I-I want to investigate what’s going on, too. Mr. Faust, could you please help us out?

name: Nero
line: Well, let's report what happened to the higher-ups tomorrow. We're headed home for now.

name: Snow
line: Heathcliff, Shino, you're both so early to rise.

name: Shino
line: Don't treat me like a kid.

name: Heathcliff
line: I didn’t expect to see you two here as well, Sir Snow and Sir White.

name: Snow
line: Indeed. We wanted to have some morning tea together. We asked Oz to join us too, but he refused.

name: White
line: Arthur, no need for you to feel down. I assume he simply doesn't want to face you because he couldn't use his magic last night.

name: Arthur
line: But... It's all due to the injury left by the < Great Catastrophe >; it's not Sir Oz’s fault.

name: Heathcliff
line: Yes.... And we’re still in the dark about Mr. Faust’s and Murr’s injuries as well.

name: Shino
line: Once we figure out what someone’s bizarre injury is, is there any way to cure it?

name: Snow
line: We're currently working on finding a solution. We really have so much to do.

name: White
line: But once we're through with the inauguration ceremony this afternoon, we should have some room to breathe.

name: Snow
line: Which involves greeting the citizens down in the square from the castle balcony.

name: Shino
line: We get to speak to the crowd from the balcony...? That sounds cool — it’s just like what the Lord of Blanchett does.

name: Arthur
line: Ahaha. It'll happen soon enough. We're set to greet them at noontime.

name: White
line: Now then, Sage. Why are you here? You came to tell us something, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes. Last night, when we went to the cemetery....

name: Heathcliff
line: That's right. They simply took the corpses without laying a finger on the treasures that lay within the coffins....

name: Arthur
line: I’m also concerned by what you said about the buried treasure being affected by the < Great Catastrophe > drawing too close, as well as the shadow of a giant bird......

name: Snow
line: The shadow of a giant bird....

name: White
line: I feel like I've heard of it before, but perhaps I have not.....

name: Snow
line: Hm.... I feel like I almost have it.

name: White
line: When you grow older, your memory just doesn't work the way it used to.

name: Shino
line: We can't just wait around hoping that Snow and White will recall anything. I'll help with the investigation.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hold it, Shino! I apologize, Prince Arthur. Shino is still a child.....

name: Shino
line: You're the naive child here. Hey, your Highness. I'm a mere servant who has never known his parents. I want something that will gain me the trust of society.

name: Arthur
line: I see.... But I cannot be the one to grant you anything.

name: Arthur
line: Because if I grant a personal reward to a vassal of the Blanchett family — the great nobles of the East — it'll compromise our diplomatic relations.

name: Shino
line: Make me a knight assigned to a general, or the close advisor of a minister.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....A knight assigned to a general....? Do you plan on leaving Blanchett?

name: Shino
line: Yeah, with you. Heathcliff, you’re going to be the general or the minister.

name: Heathcliff
line: Wh-what are you saying, you idiot!? There’s no way I could be a general or a minister, and I wouldn’t want to, either......

name: Shino
line: But why? If anyone speaks poorly of a general, he can just chop off their heads. That way, nobody will start rumors about you.

name: Arthur
line: Haha..... I don’t know about that reasoning. People speak ill of me, even though I'm a prince. There’s really nothing that will shield you from rumors.

name: Arthur
line: But if all goes well, I will write a letter to the royal family of the East. Is that all right?

name: Arthur
line: Oh, Nicholas. Good timing. There’s something I’d like the Magical Technology Corps to investigate. It looks like there was a graverobbing incident at the capital’s cemetery—.

name: Arthur
line: Yes. I hear that all the graves were overturned.

name: Nicholas
line: What a fanciful tale you’re telling. My subordinates went to the cemetery this morning, and they reported nothing out of the ordinary.

name: Shino
line: That can't be true. Last night we saw......

name: Nicholas
line: You must have been dreaming. Why were you at the cemetery anyway?

name: Arthur
line: Don't be rude. The Eastern wizards received a bizarre report from a maid at the castle and went to investigate.

name: Shino
line: Yes. That the shadow of a giant bird crawled out of the cemetery and destroyed the tower....

name: Nicholas
line: The shadow of a giant bird? Haha...... You really went and took the nonsensical ramblings of a young girl for truth.

name: Snow
line: But that goes for your subordinates as well — what were they doing in the cemetery first thing in the morning?

name: Nicholas
line: There were several complaints from citizens about a strange light coming from the cemetery in the middle of the night.

name: Shino
line: I'm going to check out the cemetery. Those graves were definitely overturned.

name: Akira
line: Please let me go with you.

name: Nicholas
line: How pointless. I’ve confirmed that there was nothing unusual with my own two eyes. Or would the absence of graverobbers be inconvenient for your purposes?

name: Nicholas
line: Even Oz, the strongest and most feared wizard in the world, couldn’t use his powers in front of the people. We, the Magical Technology Corps, were the ones who repaired the tower gates.

name: Heathcliff
line: Mister Nicholas, Captain of the Magical Technology Corps. I too was there to witness the damage wrought by the graverobbers.

name: Heathcliff
line: I see you are suggesting that we have disgraced the dead in order to manufacture accomplishments in our name.

name: Nicholas
line: .....I offer you my deepest apologies. Please forgive me for my foolish words.

name: Heathcliff
line: Oh, I can't assure you anything; you know very well that people from Eastern Country hold deep grudges.

name: Nicholas
line: ........ Please excuse me. I’ll be taking my leave.

name: Arthur
line: Heathcliff. I apologize on behalf of Nicholas.....

name: Heathcliff
line: No, it's all right. Please don't worry about it.

name: Heathcliff
line: No I wasn't.... I shouldn't have lost my cool like that; how embarrassing. They're going to call us gloomy, vindictive wizards again.

name: Shino
line: Let's dig everything up again. The bones might still be gone.

name: Snow
line: Stop it, Shino. If we dig up the graves now, then the people really will start baseless rumors.

name: White
line: And there’s no need to — I can sense that the corpses are gone. Someone must have taken them.

name: Snow
line: Something horrible might befall the Central capital soon.

name: White
line: How interesting. We should offer a warning to Arthur.

name: Snow
line: Well then, Sage, we will go report the situation to Arthur.

name: Shino
line: We'll continue with our own investigation. I’m not letting the Magical Technology Corps steal all the credit.

name: White
line: Make sure you come back in time for the inauguration ceremony.

name: Drummond
line: Sir Sage! Thank goodness, what perfect timing....

name: Drummond
line: Please lend us your power! Since the approach of the < Great Catastrophe >, we have received repeated reports of mysterious incidents happening all over the capital!

name: Shino
line: Huh? What about waving at everyone from the balcony?

name: Heathcliff
line: It looks like there’s a problem. Let's be patient and wait.

name: Shino
line: ....Fine. That means we can investigate as much as we want without worrying about the time. Let's go, Heath.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino! I’m sorry, Sir Sage. Please excuse us.

name: Heathcliff
line: How are you planning on continuing this investigation anyway?

name: Shino
line: Anything will do, so long as it brings us recognition.

name: Heathcliff
line: Recognition.... Shino, were you serious about making me an Eastern Country general....?

name: Shino
line: Of course I was. You'd never go for a title like that on your own.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, you don't know what you’re talking about.... If I become a general, what are you going to do if we go to a war with Central Country?

name: Shino
line: When that happens, I'll seize this entire castle and offer it to you.

name: Shino
line: I'll destroy anything in this world to create a path where you can walk with your head high. I'll steal anything and grant it all to you.

name: Shino
line: You don't need to do anything. I will make you a hero. And when that happens, we can go back to the way we used to be.

name: Shino
line: ......You always used to be so happy whenever I brought you something.

name: Heathcliff
line: B-but.... You’re talking about flowers and squirrels!?

name: Shino
line: A generalship and a castle are the same sort of thing.

name: Shino
line: They are the same, because they all suit you. They’ll also please Master and Mistress. Anyway, for starters, let's secure our prestige in Central Country.

name: Akira
line: Mister Drummond. What do you mean by mysterious incidents.......?

name: Drummond
line: Yes, well.... There have been reports from the capital detailing ancient treasures glowing curiously, and people have been witnessing long-extinct creatures from the distant past.......

name: Drummond
line: It's a palace filled with historic ruins, artifacts, and artwork of incredible academic value collected from all around the world. Many magical tools are stored there for safekeeping as well.

name: Akira
line: You can’t reach Mister Cock Robin?

name: Drummond
line: Yes... I asked the Magical Technology Corps to help me out, but they refused, saying they had so much to do.....

name: Murr
line: It's Sir Sage. Heeeey, Sir Sage!

name: Rustica
line: Good morning, Sir Sage. Last night was simply wonderful.

name: Chloe
line: It was so fun! I even made a new friend~. I'm going to make her a scarf!

name: Shylock
line: What were the two of you discussing?

name: Akira
line: Well...... There have been all kinds of mysterious incidents occurring at this place called the Lunar Eclipse Palace, and Mister Cock Robin seems to have gone missing because of it.

name: Rustica
line: He got lost in a palace? It must be quite huge.

name: Chloe
line: He said there were mysterious incidents going on, so maybe it’s all under a spell?

name: Shylock
line: There were many bizarre items in that palace, after all.

name: Akira
line: Are you familiar with the palace?

name: Shylock
line: Murr was very fond of it, you see. He would sneak in without permission, browse around without permission, steal items without permission, and also add items without permission.

name: Drummond
line: H-he did what with the great artifacts of our country!?

name: Shylock
line: Please direct your complaints at Murr. But you want us to look for the missing Cock Robin, right?

name: Drummond
line: ....I do. Could you please save him?

name: Shylock
line: Well, so long as you don't mind relying on these irresponsible, lying wizards.

name: Drummond
line: ............. Of course not. I beg you.

name: Rustica
line: I’m sure you must be anxious not knowing what has happened to him. I understand that feeling all too well.

name: Drummond
line: ....I see. I hope you... Manage to find her.

name: Chloe
line: You're a nice old guy. Let me help out! We should all work together!

name: Akira
line: Oh...... P-please wait! Can I come along too? I’m worried about Mister Cock Robin......

name: Murr
line: Sure! Wanna hop on my broom?

name: Shylock
line: Murr, you fly like an acrobat. I'll take you instead, Sir Sage.

name: Shylock
line: The Lunar Eclipse Palace lies just beyond that forest. We’ll be there soon enough.

name: Chloe
line: The weather is so nice today! It’s perfect for flying.

name: Rustica
line: It's also the perfect weather to host a tea party in the garden. We can sing and dance, round and round.

name: Murr
line: Sounds fun! Hey, Sir Sage, do you like to sing?

name: Akira
line: I'm not very good at it, so....

name: Murr
line: It doesn’t matter whether you’re good or bad! The real question is, do you like it or hate it?

name: Rustica
line: That's right. Sir Sage, if you like something — whether it’s singing or dancing — you should enjoy it to your heart’s content.

name: Chloe
line: We don't want to have fun with a talented singer — we just want to have fun with you, Sir Sage!

name: Akira
line: Haha... Then I guess I’ll sing the next time you host a tea party.

name: Akira
line: Um... May I ask you all a question?

name: Akira
line: Why did you accept Mister Drummond's request?

name: Shylock
line: It's very simple. I'm doing it because I decided I wanted to.

name: You are correct when you say that we are not particularly influenced by our surroundings
line: we do indeed live life as we please.

name: Rustica
line: Wizards may live long lives, but it's still a waste to spend your time on things that make you sad or angry.

name: Chloe
line: We're not very good at staying depressed, you see. But we are really good at smiling — even if that might seem a little distorted.

name: Akira
line: All alone...? But Chloe, you and Rustica get along so well. The same goes for Murr and Shylock.....

name: Rustica
line: We are lonely beings. For no matter how much time we spend in company — at the end of our lives, we’re fated to turn into cold stone all alone.

name: Shylock
line: We've arrived at the palace, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: So this is the Lunar Eclipse Palace......

name: Chloe
line: It's kind of dark in here...... I'm getting creepy crawly feelings.....

name: Shylock
line: Yes, you're right.... Don’t mind me. Let's go.

name: Rustica
line: I'm fine. But now I know that a butterfly has a terrifying face upon close inspection. It'll probably turn up in my nightmares tonight.

name: Chloe
line: Geez, Rustica, you're always so laid back.

name: Chloe
line: A temporary protective spell. You’re not hurt anywhere, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes, I’m all right. Thank you.

name: Shylock
line: Stop with this puerile prank right now. Come on out.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean, come on out? Is there someone else in this room?

name: Shylock
line: Oh, yes. In fact, he’s a wizard with a terrible personality who makes a hobby out of provoking others.....
Oh dear, what a nasty description.
It’s been ages since we last met, yet you insult me so coldly.

name: Mithra
line: Please give me one of those. Ah... and one of these, too.

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: Mister Sage’s Wizard, um...... I need payment.....

name: Mithra
line: Did you just make a demand?

name: Mithra
line: If we were in the North, I would have killed you already. How would you like that?

name: Rutile
line: I'm the Southern wizard Rutile. This is my little brother Mitile.

name: Mithra
line: Yes, because I was bored. You see, I need to be careful about what I do, or else Oz will come after me. It's such a pain.

name: Rutile
line: We met once when I was a child. Do you remember me?

name: Mithra
line: A monkey's arm? A vanara arm is a powerful talisman, but you’re saying I gave you one?

name: Rutile
line: Yes. When Mitile was still in our mother's stomach.

name: Rutile
line: Ah, I forgot to tell you the most important part. Our mother was a witch, and her name was....

name: Mithra
line: I don't care. Since I don't remember.

name: Mithra
line: Please get out of my way.

name: Rutile
line: S-sorry for taking up your time.....

name: Rutile
line: Sorry, Mitile. It looks like it was a misunderstanding on my part.

name: Mitile
line: There's no way we'd know a Northern wizard. Mother was a great witch, after all.

name: Rutile
line: There you go again. You know, there are lots of good things about the Northern wizards, too.

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: Hey, you there. Do you know that guy?

name: Central town shopkeeper
line: Great! Can you pay for everything he gobbled up?

name: Rutile
line: H.... Hey, don't say that. Maybe he just didn't know how to buy groceries.

name: Mitile
line: You're too kind! Our reputation is tanking because the Northern wizards do whatever they want.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro... and Mister Lennox, too. What are you two doing here?

name: Lennox
line: We were asked to help fix up the city. Apparently there’s been a series of bizarre events that slowed down the reconstruction work.

name: Bradley
line: Tch..... The twins said I could reduce my sentence by doing volunteer work.

name: Akira
line: Where is everyone? Where are you guys......!?

name: Murr
line: Pardon me, Sir Sage. It looks like my surprise was a bit much for you.

name: Akira
line: ......Are you the Murr I met in the elevator......?

name: Murr
line: No, this is the first time we've met. I've always been here, in the Lunar Eclipse Palace. I was quite fond of this place, after all.

name: Akira
line: A shard of your dearest beloved....?

name: Murr
line: A shard of the moon.... A moonstone. A small meteorite that arrived from the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: The < Great Catastrophe >......? The < Great Catastrophe > is your dearest beloved?

name: Murr
line: I am the Western wizard Murr. People called me a philosopher, a genius, a brilliant inventor....

name: Murr
line: Don't ask the same question twice; that's boring. Try a different approach. You can find the answer.

name: Akira
line: ....You're a different person than the Murr I was with? Or are you the real Murr?

name: Murr
line: Both answers are right, and also wrong.

name: Murr
line: Think. I love observing people’s faces as they think.

name: Murr
line: They freeze, as if in temporary death; yet they're busy thinking round and round in their minds and hearts. It's quite serene, raw, and beautiful.

name: Akira
line: ...The Murr I was with up till now was quite strange, but you are plenty strange too....

name: Murr
line: What great praise. If I'm the same as anyone else, there's no reason for me to be alive.

name: Akira
line: ....Are you a piece of Murr's shattered soul....?

name: Murr
line: Excellent! I am one of the many pieces of Murr's shattered soul, which lie all over the world.

name: Akira
line: The shards of his soul take physical form... So this is Murr's bizarre injury....

name: Murr
line: Bizarre injury. That's an interesting phrase. I’m quite fond of it.

name: Akira
line: Um... So, there are Murrs like you all over the world — if we gather them all, will Murr return to his former self?

name: Murr
line: Perhaps. But I can't say I like the idea. Murr is too intelligent; his brain can never stay in one place.

name: Akira
line: I don't think I can answer that question for you.....

name: Murr
line: I see. To whom do you think I should make my demands known? Do soul shards have human rights?

name: Akira
line: W... Why did you kidnap Mister Cock Robin? Because you didn’t want him to get in the way of your research?

name: Murr
line: I didn't kidnap him. I simply stopped him from wandering further into the palace. Because therein lie the traces of a powerful spell.

name: Murr
line: Yes. An unsuccessful invocation has lost its harmony and is now changing form.

name: Akira
line: W-what does that mean? Please speak in simpler terms....

name: Murr
line: People tried to beckon the < Great Catastrophe > to draw close — presumably, people all over the world. This is merely one part of a greater summoning circle.

name: I am confused. Everyone so far told me the same thing
line: that the world will be destroyed when the < Great Catastrophe > comes close.

name: Akira
line: You mean someone was trying to beckon the < Great Catastrophe >, and that's what caused all this damage? But it’s going to cause the end of the world — why would they do this....?

name: Murr
line: Unfortunately, I don't have the answer to that. Perhaps another Murr could tell you, but all I know of is the tragedy that is about to follow.

name: Murr
line: The invocation that was carried out here.... In other words, the summoning of the moon failed, and it is transforming into an entirely different spell.

name: Rustica
line: Sir Sage, are you all right!?

name: Chloe
line: Is that man...... The other Murr we saw just moments ago!?

name: Murr
line: Hello, Shylock. It's certainly been a while. The scent of your pipe reminds me of the times we spent all night in argument.

name: Shylock
line: It has certainly been a while since I last saw such a garrulous Murr. You must be a piece of Murr's soul.

name: Murr
line: Indeed. What are you going to do with me?

name: Shylock
line: I'm going to retrieve you and return you to Murr.

name: Murr
line: Really? My dear friend Shylock, do you really want to do such a thing?

name: Murr
line: I thought you were quite fond of him. The innocent and simple-minded me, who rolls around like a stray cat.

name: Murr
line: He won't talk down to you; he won't insult you. He'll listen to your every command. The foolish and adorable Murr, who belongs only to you.

name: Shylock
line: ....Oh loathsome Murr. But if you are going to call me a friend, I do wish you would understand me a bit better.

name: Murr
line: I believe I do understand you. You wanted to stop me from inventing magical science technology. But I refused.

name: Shylock
line: I am merely saying that I would only like to defeat you after you return to your full strength.

name: Murr
line: You're a fool. If I return to my former self, you wouldn’t stand a chance. Because I'm stronger and smarter than you.

name: Shylock
line: You know, I always did think that you needed a proper education in good taste.

name: Shylock
line: Do not fear. I will give the new Murr a fine teaching.

name: Rustica
line: Sh-Shylock... Isn't this a bit much.... It makes me want to close my eyes....

name: Shylock
line: Then why don't you look away?

name: Chloe
line: Y-you really aren't holding back.... Shylock, are you mad....?

name: Shylock
line: It's just as this man said.

name: Shylock
line: I have always been furious at Murr, and I have always wanted to get my revenge.

name: Chloe
line: Phew... Thank goodness we’re back.... So Murr’s soul shard made that weird space, huh....

name: Shylock
line: That seems to be the case.

name: Murr
line: We were in space! Did you guys see?

name: Chloe
line: We did! But more importantly, Murr, you were in huge trouble.

name: Shylock
line: Everything is all right now. Open your mouth.

name: Shylock
line: How do you feel about me?

name: Chloe
line: Do you really think so....? Personally, it's getting to my stomach after the grotesque scene back there.....

name: Rustica
line: They've lived long lives, you see; that’s why their friendship is just a bit extreme.

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, you've lived a long life too, right...? Let's make our friendship not-so-extreme, please....?

name: Rustica
line: I'll do my best. Murr. Did eating that shard help you remember anything?

name: Shylock
line: Don't worry. The person who trapped you was Murr, but it was also not Murr.

name: Akira
line: He said he trapped you so that you wouldn’t head into the back of the palace. He did it to save you.

name: Cock Robin
line: I... I see. I thought I would be stuck in there forever. Thank you, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Please say that to them. I wasn't the one who saved you — they were.

name: Chloe
line: No worries! More importantly, do you remember what happened?

name: Cock Robin
line: Um, let me see...... The curator of the Lunar Eclipse Palace asked me to look into things, so that’s why I was exploring the place by myself.

name: Rustica
line: That’s amazing. You must be a very brave person.

name: Cock Robin
line: N-no, not at all! I'm actually very timid. But you let me ride on your brooms, and when I flew through the sky....

name: Chloe
line: That sounds like a lot. I’m sorry you had to go through that.

name: Shylock
line: A creepy, eerie door... Could you take us there?

name: Cain
line: ....Phew. I'm finally back at the castle. The < Great Catastrophe > caused so much trouble — there’s weird stuff going on all over the capital.

name: Central Country soldier
line: ....? Are you all right? Perhaps you need to get some rest.

name: Cain
line: Sorry, my eyes haven’t been doing so well lately.

name: Central Country soldier
line: That's terrible...! Let's get you to a doctor immediately...!

name: Cain
line: Nah, it's no big deal. But... Could you hold my hand?

name: Central Country soldier
line: The hero, General Cain's hand... The hand of the former leader of the Order of Knights and the greatest warrior in all of Central... I'm sure I will be blessed by a goddess!

name: Cain
line: No, it's not that big a deal....

name: Central Country soldier
line: But excuse me for one second, my nails are soiled! Let me wash my hands first....!

name: Cain
line: Ah, I can finally see you.

name: Central Country soldier
line: General Cain's hand... Is so big......

name: Cain
line: Well, sure. How is the Order of Knights holding up after the attack of the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Central Country soldier
line: Yes. It was all thanks to your training, General Cain....

name: Nicholas
line: What are you doing? Return to your position.

name: Nicholas
line: Show some deference to your superiors.

name: Cain
line: He was talking to me, Sir Nicholas, leader of the Order of Knights — no, captain of the Magical Technology Corps, I guess.

name: Nicholas
line: You taking my spot as the leader of the Order of Knights is already a story of the past.

name: Cain
line: I don't recall using magic when I fought you.

name: Nicholas
line: What did I say about deference?

name: Cain
line: ....Sir. But you're weird, too. I remember how much you hated magic. Why did you join the Magical Technology Corps?

name: Nicholas
line: Stop acting like you still have any connection to the Central knights. You’re already a wizard and an outsider.

name: Nicholas
line: Wizards can manipulate any heart and steal their way past any door. They could easily get their hands on national secrets.

name: Cain
line: What are you suggesting? Are you trying to say I'd betray this country?

name: Nicholas
line: Wizards make organizations fall apart. They aren't suited to knighthood. There's no place for you within this castle anymore.

name: Owen
line: Oh dear? Why did you protect him?

name: Owen
line: I was going to kill him for you.

name: Cain
line: Run. You don't stand a chance against him.

name: Nicholas
line: Shut up! Get down here, Northern wizard Owen! Get on your knees, and show me what's inside your bag!

name: Nicholas
line: Yes. You might be bringing suspicious items into the castle.

name: Owen
line: I mean, sure. But the moment I open this bag, you’re dead.

name: Cain
line: Go. I mean, please go. I'll hold him off.....

name: Owen
line: Ahaha. Even though you protected him. He insulted the both of us together.

name: Central Country man
line: Excuse me, could you help me move this rubble?

name: Bradley
line: Dammit. Why the hell does the great Bradley have to do volunteer work?

name: Figaro
line: Now now, no whining. You don't want to go back to prison, right? You should be grateful for your freedom.

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro, could you help me out here?

name: Bradley
line: .....Why the hell are you being all friendly with the Southern wizards, Northern wizard Figaro?

name: Figaro
line: Because I like humans. Also, I’ve kept my origins a secret from those two. I'll punish you if you let it slip, Bradley.

name: Figaro
line: All right, I'm headed off. Ask Lennox for further instructions. Leno, take care of him.

name: Bradley
line: Dammit, what a pain..... There! Are you satisfied?

name: Bradley
line: Hmph.... You're not as strong as Figaro. What would you do if I killed you and ran away?

name: Bradley
line: That's all you have to say!?

name: Lennox
line: I mean... It would be a big problem.

name: Lennox
line: Please keep working. You can help everyone out by clearing this path.

name: Bradley
line: Stop acting all nice. I’ll let you in on something good.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph. Did I make you mad? Bet I hit the mark. I had lots of underlings, after all.

name: Lennox
line: I'm sorry. I'm not very good at talking. It takes me a while to gather my thoughts.... Rutile complains about this all the time.

name: Bradley
line: .......You really are absent-minded. You just took the fun out of it.

name: Bradley
line: Shut up, you already said that! Geez....

name: Central Country child
line: Mister Wizard, thank you for helping us out! This bread is from Mother.....

name: Bradley
line: I'm working harder than you. So I get to eat it.

name: Lennox
line: I see. It's easy to get frustrated when you're hungry, isn't it.

name: Bradley
line: I wasn't whining because I was hungry! Geez, Southern wizards are so slow....

name: Bradley
line: What are you looking at? I'm gonna eat you too.

name: Lennox
line: Don't threaten a young child.... Thank you. Say thanks to your mother for me.

name: Mitile
line: Hey! Why are you bullying him!

name: Bradley
line: The hell's with you? Want me to make you cry too?

name: Mitile
line: I... I can't have you making all of us wizards look bad.

name: Bradley
line: Well, that’s not my problem. The only ones who'd wind up in trouble are weak goody-two-shoes like you.

name: Mitile
line: I'm not sucking up to anyone! I just want everyone to get along....

name: Bradley
line: Why does everyone need to get along? We can live on our own.

name: Mitile
line: This is where everyone here has lived up till now. They’re all attached to this place.

name: Mitile
line: We should help each other out in times of trouble! So that we can all live together....

name: Bradley
line: What's the deal with "everyone"? Why do you need everyone to get along?

name: Mitile
line: Most people like being with others. Most people want to be loved; we don't want to be hated! I guess it's different for Northern wizards!

name: Bradley
line: Yeah. I don't get it. Why do you want people to love you? Why are you so afraid of being hated?

name: Bradley
line: You don’t know? Then you're the same as me.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph. How pointless. You don't even know why you're all hung up on "everyone, everyone" in the first place.

name: Bradley
line: ...What now, you're gonna cry? This is why I hate kids.....

name: Mitile
line: When I become a powerful wizard, I'll definitely defeat you.......

name: Mitile
line: I'll definitely, definitely beat you up!!

name: Bradley
line: Wanting to beat up the guys who piss you off — that's the kind of logic I can follow. Much better than "let's all get along."

name: Mitile
line: ......I'd never go to the North! Don't lump me in with bad guys like you!

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro..... This Northern wizard keeps saying awful, senseless things.....

name: Figaro
line: There, there. Northern wizards sure are awful~. Dr. Figaro will protect you.

name: Lennox
line: Now that you’ve eaten, we should keep working. Come on.

name: Bradley
line: Don't drag me around! Listen up, you're not allowed to order me around! I get to decide what I'll do next.....

name: Lennox
line: Got it. Then please, lead us along. First, say thanks for the meal.

name: Bradley
line: Thanks for the meal.... Hey, what the fuck, are you picking a fight with me!?

name: Figaro
line: Geez, what a fuss. Mitile, everything’s all right now.

name: Mitile
line: I want to get stronger.... I want to become a powerful wizard. Please teach me powerful magic.

name: Mitile
line: If I were powerful, Mister Bradley would've listened to what I had to say. Because what I'm saying is correct!

name: Figaro
line: That's not true. Mitile, you're still young. You don't need to sweat it.

name: Figaro
line: Plus, Mitile, do you really want to become stronger in order to help everyone else?

name: Figaro
line: Are you sure it's not for your own sake, because Bradley beat you in an argument? When you say "for everyone’s sake," is Bradley included in that?

name: Figaro
line: Calm down and think about it. If you force your selfish desires onto everyone in the name of justice, that would make you no different from a dictator who executes whoever he wants on a whim.

name: Figaro
line: Ah, look. Rutile is over there. He looks troubled. You should go help him out.

name: Snow
line: Was it all right for us to force the Southern wizards to keep an eye on Bradley?

name: White
line: Figaro is with them, so I’m sure they’ll be fine. And nothing strange seems to be happening with the child of the prophecy for now.

name: Snow
line: The prophecy we saw before Tiretta died.

name: Snow
line: We prophesied that the next child born from Tiretta would annihilate all the Southern wizards.

name: White
line: In truth, the great witch Tiretta died when he was born.

name: Snow
line: Now, now, let's see how this goes. We don't know if the prophecy will come to pass in ten years, or in a hundred....

name: Rutile
line: He helped me with some restoration work. But now I'm being bombarded with questions....

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Hey, how do I become a wizard? Can I use magic too?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Yeah! Because if I could use magic, I could do lots of things, and I'd never have to look for work.

name: Rutile
line: Humans can't become wizards. It’s the sort of thing that's decided the moment you’re born.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: But I heard there's a way for humans to use magic too!

name: Rutile
line: I guess you're talking about magical technology from the West? I don’t know much about that, you see. .....Huh?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: It's a part of my job! I'm taking care of an important package.

name: Mitile
line: It looks heavy. Do you need help?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: I'm fine! Mister Mithra, the Sage's wizard, asked me to take care of it.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Ah, I just remembered I have something to do! I need to go! Bye-bye....!

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra.... What did he ask such a young child to do?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Ah, there he is. Mister Mithra!

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: I met the Sage's wizards! And just as you said, nobody realized what was going on!

name: Mithra
line: Don't remove your clothes. I told you not to show that to anyone.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Yay! If I sell this, I’ll be rich! It's so beautiful......

name: Akira
line: So this is the back of the palace... Mister Cock Robin, is this the room you tried to enter before you were stopped?

name: Rustica
line: This is awful... If you stepped in here without suspecting anything, your soul might've been destroyed.

name: Shylock
line: Everything here is dancing in madness
column3: a powerful and troublesome spell fell apart, and the order that existed in this room has been contaminated.

name: Akira
line: You mean we can't go any further?

name: Murr
line: I set up a temporary balance of reason here. But it'll go back to chaos in no time. If you're gonna head inside, hurry!

name: Murr
line: Probably long enough for me to do three loops in the sky!

name: Shylock
line: So about a hundred seconds. Chloe, stay here with Cock Robin. When there are ten seconds left, please start counting down.

name: Shylock
line: .....They've tied together the sacrifices with a rose vine. This is a method you use when you merge living offerings, but....

name: Rustica
line: They couldn't prepare living sacrifices. That's why they used ancient bones instead...

name: Rustica
line: Poor things.... The bones here weren't just lying around in the wild. They belong to sleeping souls who had been properly buried.

name: Akira
line: Sleeping souls who had been properly buried...... Are these the bones stolen from the cemetery....?

name: Rustica
line: When you're making such a powerful circle, you need a medium. Such as a piece of a star or a holy tree, or a relic once owned by a hero....

name: Shylock
line: Which object within the Lunar Eclipse Palace was most worthy to be used as a medium....?

name: Rustica
line: The moonstone!? But if you use the moonstone as a medium, then god knows what could happen....

name: Rustica
line: Who did this? And for what purpose...?

name: Akira
line: Murr's soul shard said that someone tried to beckon the moon to draw closer — that this was just one part of a greater magic circle....

name: Shylock
line: Someone tried to beckon the < Great Catastrophe >...?

name: Rustica
line: That's what caused this tragedy!? How terrible....

name: Akira
line: There’s something else...... He also mentioned that the summoning failed, and that’s why it transformed into an entirely different spell.

name: Shylock
line: An entirely different spell...? What does that mean?

name: Akira
line: He mentioned an Umbra... Umbra something. And that the twins would know about it.

name: Rustica
line: Let's get out of the room for now. Sir Sage, this way.

name: Murr
line: Umm~, give me just one second.......

name: Chloe
line: God, you surprised me! I thought you wouldn't make it in time! Geez, don't make me so worried!

name: Shylock
line: This looks like the driving system for a piece of magical technology machinery. It materializes the magic from inside a mana stone. Though I’m not too familiar with this particular form.....

name: Cock Robin
line: ....This is.... This is what the Magical Technology Corps of our country uses......

name: Cock Robin
line: I'm sure of it.... Because the Ministry of Magical Affairs ordered these in an attempt to adopt the techniques of the West.

name: Shylock
line: It means someone from the Magical Technology Corps is involved... Or they were dragged into this mess as victims. We’ll find out once we return to the castle.

name: Akira
line: Mister Cock Robin is safe, too, so that’s probably the best thing to do for now. Let’s head back to the castle.

name: Rustica
line: Yes. We need to ask Sir Snow and Sir White some questions, too.

name: Chloe
line: I need to give my friend the scarf I made, too!

name: Drummond
line: I’m so glad you’re safe, Cock Robin......! What in the world happened to you?

name: Akira
line: He was trapped inside the Lunar Eclipse Palace. But the wizards managed to rescue him!

name: Drummond
line: I see.... Good lord, don't be so reckless.....

name: Akira
line: Not at all. Thanks to Mister Cock Robin, we managed to uncover a terrible secret.

name: Cock Robin
line: There's some crazy people out there who tried to summon the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Cock Robin
line: There were tons of bones, and a weird magic circle, and to top it off, equipment from our very own Magical Technology Corps!

name: Drummond
line: From the Magical Technology Corps!? What do you mean!?

name: Shylock
line: We too would like to uncover the truth. Who from the Magical Technology Corps was involved in this ritual — and how?

name: Drummond
line: Yes, you're right.... This is probably a situation where the Ministry of Magical Affairs and the Sage's wizards ought to work together......

name: Shylock
line: I'm glad you seem to understand. So, where is that man who always seems to be so full of himself? The head of the Magical Technology Corps...

name: Rustica
line: That's the captain of the Magical Technology Corps......!?

name: Drummond
line: Sir Nicholas! What are you doing!? It's dangerous, Sir Nicholas!

name: Arthur
line: Nicholas! Nicholas, are you all right!?

name: Chloe
line: Ah, I’m glad he’s safe....! Thank you, Prince Arthur!

name: Arthur
line: No, thank you! What in the world happened to Nicholas!?

name: Lady
line: Sir Nicholas leapt off the balcony......

name: Man
line: Sir Nicholas would never do such a thing!

name: Man
line: He tried to manipulate Sir Nicholas into committing suicide!

name: Castle person
line: I hear that the Sage's wizards nearly killed Sir Nicholas......!

name: Castle person
line: What!? Why would they do such a thing....?

name: Castle person
line: It's the Northern wizards! They're all wicked wizards! They see humans as nothing but slaves!

name: Castle person
line: I heard this from a friend
column3: the wreckage caused by the < Great Catastrophe > was so devastating because the Northern wizards were so wicked!

name: Castle person
line: Listen to what I heard from my friend's acquaintance — he said the Sage's wizards are all manipulating Prince Arthur!

name: Castle person
line: But they’re the ones who fought to protect the world.....

name: Castle person
line: You should never trust a wizard! You're young and beautiful, so they'll manipulate your heart and do whatever they please to you!

name: Castle person
line: I'm scared...... I want them to leave the castle right now......

name: Vincent
line: The Northern wizard tried to manipulate Nicholas into throwing himself off the balcony?

name: Drummond
line: Th-there’s still no proof, but...... Lord Vincent, leaving that aside, there’s another matter of great importance.

name: Vincent
line: Work with the men who nearly killed Nicholas? How preposterous!

name: Drummond
line: But we've yet to perform the inauguration ceremony......

name: Vincent
line: There’s no need to hold an inauguration ceremony for traitors. I’ll need to give Arthur a severe talking-to as well.

name: Vincent
line: The Magical Technology Corps can handle it.

name: Figaro
line: Owen killed the captain of the Magical Technology Corps?

name: Akira
line: H-he didn't kill him. Mister Nicholas is still alive. But he hasn’t regained consciousness yet......

name: Figaro
line: So he's alive? But would Owen really fail if he wanted to kill someone like that?

name: Snow
line: Perhaps he never intended to kill him. Even if that were the case, Owen still enjoys tearing away at people's hearts, so....

name: White
line: Perhaps Owen was simply having a fun time chatting, and Nicholas felt pressed into jumping off the balcony because of it.

name: Cain
line: Dammit, Owen, look what you’ve done.... Everyone's going to be even more suspicious of wizards now.

name: Snow
line: What happened at the Lunar Eclipse Palace?

name: White
line: Is that Mitile’s voice......? He seems to be arguing with someone.

name: Soldier
line: Your comrade tried to kill Sir Nicholas!

name: Soldier
line: Just because the Magical Technology Corps threatened your status as heroes......! What unbelievable cruelty!

name: Mitile
line: We don't know anything about that! Owen is a Northern wizard, right!? The Southern wizards have nothing to do with.....

name: Soldier
line: All wizards are the same! Get out of this castle! Stop taking advantage of Prince Arthur!

name: Mitile
line: But we were invited here as guests!?

name: Rutile
line: Stop it, Mitile. The soldiers are just afraid.

name: Mitile
line: But we didn’t do anything wrong....!

name: Soldier
line: What are you muttering on about!? Get out of the castle right now!

name: Mitile
line: Stop it! Don't hurt my brother......!

name: Lennox
line: I'm a Southern wizard. But I can knock you out in three seconds without using any magic.

name: Soldier
line: .....Tch.... So the wizards hired a mercenary......

name: Soldier
line: What the hell are you saying!? Let's go...... You need to grab your stuff and get out of here!

name: Rutile
line: Yes.... Thank you, Mister Leno. Your grand entrances have been really cool lately.

name: Mitile
line: He pulled nii-sama's hair! These Central soldiers are worse than the dine-and-dashers we see in the South!

name: Rutile
line: They think we almost killed their comrade, you know.

name: Mitile
line: But that doesn't justify violence! You were the one who taught me that!

name: Rutile
line: You're right. You're a good boy, Mitile — thank you for getting angry in my stead.

name: Mitile
line: You're too kind! They came to attack us because they think the Southern wizards are the weakest of them all!

name: Mitile
line: ......We’re always the ones who lose out! It's all Owen's fault! He's a Northern wizard too, right!?

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, Mitile! Leno, too — are you all right?

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro....! Waah.... It’s the Northern wizards’ fault that, nii-sama....

name: Rutile
line: I'm fine. A soldier just grabbed me for a second......

name: Mitile
line: ......Dr. Figaro! Why are we the ones who have to suffer when the Northern wizards are the ones who did everything wrong!?

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro, I'm sorry.... You told me that I shouldn't think like a dictator, but I... I don't care if I am one......

name: Lennox
line: ....I'm not necessarily agreeing with Mitile, but the castle is currently in chaos. It's dangerous for us to stay here.

name: Figaro
line: If we stand on the balcony now, we’re going to be showered in abuse, not applause.

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, are you sure you're not hurt?

name: Rutile
line: My body is fine.... But my heart is in pain.

name: Rustica
line: I know very well how whimsical Westerners can be, but the people of Central are certainly prone to mood swings as well.

name: Chloe
line: Ah...... Rustica. Sorry, sorry. What was that?

name: Rustica
line: Did you hide something behind your back?

name: Rustica
line: Ahaha. So now you're trying to surprise me too, Chloe. What are you hiding? A bird? A butterfly?

name: Rustica
line: ....A torn scarf? Isn’t this the scarf you embroidered, Chloe?

name: Chloe
line: She said it was pretty, so I told her she could have it as a symbol of our friendship.

name: Chloe
line: It's fine, it's fine! I'm not feeling down about it or anything! I'm used to this sort of thing, anyway!

name: Chloe
line: Maybe her friends and family would ask me to make them scarves too, and I'd get really busy......

name: Rustica
line: Your dream is absolutely lovely. If she doesn't want the scarf, can I have it instead?

name: Chloe
line: ....It's nothing valuable. Rustica, you're handsome, so you deserve to wear something much nicer.

name: Rustica
line: There's no scarf more valuable than this one.

name: Chloe
line: ....That's not true. I haven't used any expensive fabrics or threads....

name: Rustica
line: Because this scarf is the only one of its kind in this world. It's something that only you could make.

name: Rustica
line: It's more precious than a commonplace luxury you could find anywhere. It’s more precious than the moonstone; more precious than any jewel.

name: Rustica
line: I'm sure he will fix it up perfectly. This blue bird will fly freely into the sky, no matter how many times its wings are torn.

name: Rustica
line: And you have my thanks as well. Don't cry...... Please smile, Chloe.

name: Rustica
line: Please don't feel hurt. Like the bright moon that shines in the sky, we may be shoved away every time we approach someone, but......

name: Vincent
line: That damned Northern wizard Owen....... We never should have trusted the Northern wizards to begin with.

name: Vincent
line: Leave the festivities to me; you should consider staying at the royal villa for a while.

name: Vincent
line: There are awful rumors going around. They say that the reason Oz took you in was so he could take over Central Country.

name: Arthur
line: That's ridiculous...... Sir Oz isn't that kind of person!

name: Vincent
line: What proof do you have!? You are the ones who have stirred up the citizens’ anxiety!

name: Vincent
line: Oz...... Where did you come from......

name: Oz
line: If I so wished, I could conquer Central Country without controlling a child like him.

name: Central Country soldier
line: C-capture Oz......!? No one can do that........

name: Vincent
line: The sun is going to set soon. Oz won’t be able to use his magic!

name: Oz
line: Yet at this moment, I could turn this capital to ashes in an instant. I’ll start with you.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, please stop! Your anger is justified, but....

name: Soldier
line: Th-thank goodness......! Prince Arthur protected him!

name: Vincent
line: Never let Oz into the castle again!! He’s a traitor who tried to kill me......!

name: Arthur
line: You're wrong! Sir Oz isn't that kind of man! ......Sir Oz is......

name: Vincent
line: ...... Hmph...... I don't believe that. That was his true nature.

name: Arthur
line: ......Sir Oz...... Have you been avoiding me in order to protect my reputation......?

name: Akira
line: Arthur...... Are you all right? I heard Mister Vincent summoned you......

name: Arthur
line: ......He informed me that the Sage’s wizards are to leave the castle and return to the magic headquarters......

name: Arthur
line: ......I apologize; this is all because of me — it’s due to my incompetence and lack of power.......

name: Akira
line: Please don’t make that face...... It’s not your fault, Arthur......

name: Akira
line: Let's hear what Owen has to say once we find him......

name: Arthur
line: ......Thank you, Sir Sage. I am saved by your kindness......

name: Akira
line: Yes. But please don't push yourself.

name: Arthur
line: I'm all right. I feel better after speaking to you, Sir Sage. See you later!

name: Akira
line: Ah, yes. Ah......! I have something I’d like to ask you regarding Mister Nicholas.

name: Owen
line: Yeah, that’s what I thought, and I was waiting for you to say something, but you didn't utter a word. So I get to go first.

name: Akira
line: Please wait! I was just a little distracted by something else......

name: Owen
line: You were distracted? When I'm right in front of your eyes? All right, tell me about it.

name: Akira
line: You're always grinning, so I never noticed till now, but..... You're very beautiful, Owen.

name: Owen
line: Well, whatever. There’s something I’d like to ask you about the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: The < Great Catastrophe >? But wait, tell me about Mister Nicholas......

name: Owen
line: Shut up. I’m first. You mentioned that bizarre injuries were inflicted upon us when we fought the < Great Catastrophe >, right?

name: Owen
line: Can you lose your memories from that?

name: Akira
line: Lose your memories? Wait, Owen...... Have you lost your memories?

name: Akira
line: .....You don't remember what happened when you were with Mister Nicholas?

name: Owen
line: I killed him. I manipulated his heart so that he would leap off the balcony.

name: Owen
line: Why? Because I wanted to see him crushed like a tomato, of course.

name: Akira
line: Owen...... If you’ve lost your memories, then you can’t be the only one responsible here.

name: Owen
line: I killed him. It was so much fun.

name: Owen
line: Anyway, who cares about that? Tell me how to fix these bizarre injuries from the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Akira
line: So you want me to heal your injury?

name: Owen
line: I'm asking you if you can heal this injury.

name: Akira
line: I-if.... If you didn’t need me to fix it, you wouldn't be asking me for help.

name: Owen
line: Hey, Sir Sage....... If I kill you, the world might end, but—.

name: Akira
line: ......I’m aware of that. Because I've already subjected you to one such punishment.....

name: Akira
line: I assumed that you might really have done it, so I blindly suspected you.

name: As if we are being chased out
line: a stark contrast to our arrival.

name: Snow
line: So in the end we couldn't find Owen......

name: White
line: They didn’t even see us off. The situation in the Lunar Eclipse Palace is also bothering me, but first we need to regroup and figure out what to do next.....

name: Shino
line: We're just going to head back like this? Seriously?

name: Shino
line: What about the graverobbing incident at the cemetery? It has to be related to what was going on in the Lunar Eclipse Palace.

name: Cain
line: Don't put Prince Arthur in an even more difficult position. He's suffering more than anyone else.

name: Shino
line: How do you know who's suffering the most here?

name: Cain
line: Okay, maybe I was exaggerating a bit, but....

name: Shino
line: You can handle all this because you're a knight. But I'm a nobody. I was supposed to make a name for myself.

name: Cain
line: I am also a nobody. The days when I was the General of the Order of Knights are behind me now — they stripped me of my title when they discovered that I was a wizard.

name: Riquet
line: I'm going back to the Church.

name: Nero
line: What are you saying? What do you get out of heading back to a place where they won't even feed you decent meals?

name: Riquet
line: I'm worried about the people of the Church, and....

name: Mithra
line: Oh? Want to repeat that for me?

name: Bradley
line: What the hell, you shitty brat?

name: Mithra
line: What are you saying? If people want to hate us, they should feel free to.

name: Mitile
line: See, that kind of thinking is what makes people hate wizards!

name: Mitile
line: Because I don't want to see the people precious to me get hurt!

name: Mitile
line: I don't want to get hurt, either! If we’d been friendly, and if Owen had been a good person, then I’m sure the people at the castle would've listened to us.

name: Mitile
line: What's wrong with being kind? What's wrong with getting along with everyone? It’s not going to kill you.

name: Mithra
line: It's unnecessary. You simply have to defeat every person who comes your way.

name: Mithra
line: I am prepared to get hurt. I am prepared for the people around me to get hurt as well.

name: Mithra
line: "I don't want you to get hurt, so please change your way of life" — I can't just agree to that.

name: Mitile
line: ......Even if it means someone precious to you will get hurt?

name: Mithra
line: I have no such person. And I don’t plan to find one, either.

name: Mitile
line: Then I feel sorry for you.

name: Mitile
line: ......Anyway, Riquet. Please don't say you're quitting. Let's do our best together!

name: Riquet
line: ......If, as Mitile says, it is truly possible to get along with everyone......

name: Faust
line: A wonderful role? Now that sounds like something I’d much rather refuse.

name: Faust
line: I'm headed back to Eastern Country. I'll return to the tower when the < Great Catastrophe > strikes.

name: White
line: You're the only one who can keep the Sage’s wizards together.

name: Cain
line: But at this rate, we're going to fall apart.

name: Nero
line: There’s no way around it, Mister Knight. In the end, we just can't be with other people.

name: Nero
line: Wizards have always been ostracized. That's just how it's always been, for many, many years.

name: Rutile
line: ......I was just thinking that lots of people walk through the streets of Central......

name: Bradley
line: Huh? What are you talking about? Southern wizards sure are a happy-go-lucky bunch.

name: Rutile
line: There aren’t this many people back in Southern Country. It's filled with mountains, forests, and barren landscapes...... When the sun sets, it goes completely dark.

name: Rutile
line: The streets of Central are filled with people. They're all carrying loads of luggage along a narrow path; they continue to walk along, even though it looks like they're about to crash into each other.

name: Rutile
line: We all think differently. We're all different people, headed in different directions. Each of us has our own destination.

name: Rage and hope
line: at once lonely, earnest, and painful......

name: Figaro
line: What are you doing out here so late at night?

name: Figaro
line: Do you plan on leaving this place without a word?

name: Faust
line: ........... This has nothing to do with you.

name: Figaro
line: Faust. The Granvelle monarchy has continued for generations after Alec's death.

name: Figaro
line: If your wounds haven't healed after being alone for all those years — that means you need someone else.

name: Figaro
line: You're so stubborn. Though I guess you've always been this serious and stubborn.

name: Figaro
line: Wait, hear me out. How does this sound? I'll steal your specialty.

name: Faust
line: What are you trying to say?

name: Figaro
line: I'm going to curse you, Faust. You don't know what your bizarre injury is. The same goes for Heathcliff.

name: Faust
line: .....Even if I’m gone, there's still Snow and White.......

name: Figaro
line: Sir Snow and Sir White are like epitome of carelessness! They were my masters, as well as Oz's!

name: Figaro
line: But you don't have to worry about that. Forget about those poor young boys, and enjoy your good old solitary confinement.

name: Figaro
line: Maybe in fifty years.... maybe in five. It might even be next year.

name: Figaro
line: Unfortunately, I’m telling the truth. Please don't tell anyone else. You're the first person to hear this from me.

name: Figaro
line: When I realized that I didn't have much time left — for the first time, I seriously thought about the world that you and Alec dreamed of.

name: Faust
line: ......... .....You're lying. I refuse to believe you. You're just trying to fool me with a nasty lie.

name: Figaro
line: That might be true. So this is something like a curse, too.

name: Nero
line: You're still awake? It’s way past bedtime for kids.

name: Nero
line: Did you get a little hungry?

name: Riquet
line: Why did you stop me from leaving? You were the one who said that wizards could never be with other people......

name: Nero
line: There was no deep reason for it. I just thought you shouldn’t have to go back to a place where they wouldn’t even feed you a decent meal.

name: Nero
line: Tomorrow's breakfast is gonna be bread pudding.

name: Nero
line: Haha...... It's crispy, soft, and sweet.

name: Nero
line: Doesn’t it? Now you have something to look forward to as you head off to bed. That's what kids should do.

name: Riquet
line: Good night, Nero. ......Also, let me say one thing.

name: Riquet
line: You said you weren't cut out to live with others, but......

name: Riquet
line: The food that you make — while you act like it’s a pain, but also like it’s no big deal — in my eyes, those meals are a miracle as wondrous as a dream.

name: Riquet
line: I'm sure I'll wake up early tomorrow. I can’t wait to open my eyes in the morning. Thank you, Nero.

name: Vincent
line: Did you find the culprits who ransacked the cemetery?

name: Soldier
line: We’re still investigating...... Everyone is spooked, you see......

name: Vincent
line: How absurd. It’s probably just robbers who used the attack of the < Great Catastrophe > as a cover to steal burial goods from the graves.

name: Soldier
line: It seems like he just regained consciousness......

name: Vincent
line: I hear that the Northern wizard Owen manipulated your heart.

name: Soldier
line: The darkness is swarming around him......!

name: Soldier
line: Lord Vincent! There’s the shadow of a bird looming behind Sir Nicholas......!

name: Soldier
line: The shadow......! The bird’s shadow is swallowing up Sir Nicholas!

name: Soldier
line: It completely swallowed him......! Lord Vincent, please escape!

name: Soldier
line: I-it seems to have flown away! We have to notify Sir Drummond and the Sage’s wizards immediately......!

name: Vincent
line: Wait! It might be some kind of magical technology that Nicholas obtained!

name: Soldier
line: No way......! Sir Nicholas was just swallowed by the bird’s shadow......

name: Vincent
line: Silence! Do not utter a word of this to anyone. Understand?

name: Vincent
line: ......If the Sage’s wizards continue to strengthen their reputation through achievements, Arthur is going to win more popularity with the people.

name: Mithra
line: The Umbra Volans is swooping through the land. It should begin soon.

name: Chapter 19
line: Bizarre Injuries Left by the Catastrophe

name: Cain
line: Prince Arthur hasn't sent word from the Central capital yet. I wonder how he’s doing...... Should I go check on him in secret?

name: Shylock
line: I would recommend against it. We have essentially been ordered to quarantine ourselves here.

name: Cain
line: But we need to find the culprit behind the incident at the Lunar Eclipse Palace....

name: Shylock
line: Of course. That is why, until things calm down, we need to do all the investigating we can here at the magic headquarters.

name: Cain
line: Investigating? At the magic headquarters......? Wh-what's with this mountain of massive books!?

name: Cain
line: ......... You see, I'm not very good at deskwork.....

name: Shylock
line: I know very well. You mischievous boy.

name: Chloe
line: Please try your best to remember! Murr apparently said that you two would know about it!

name: Snow
line: Hmm...... I feel like I might remember if I ate something sweet......

name: White
line: Maybe if someone massaged my shoulders......

name: Chloe
line: You said that yesterday, too. Geez, you keep repeating yourselves~.

name: Figaro
line: And we still don't know anything about the piece of equipment that belonged to the Magical Technology Corps, right?

name: Shylock
line: Even if they’d found anything, they might not report it to us. For it could very well cause a scandal for Central Country.

name: Figaro
line: I'd welcome a scandal or two — otherwise, they're going to start hunting wizards.

name: Akira
line: You mentioned that before. What does that mean?

name: Figaro
line: Magical technology is fueled by mana stones. Mana stones are the stones of wizards — they contain their magic powers.

name: Shylock
line: It's just as you say. With the advancement of science, the West has entered an era of madness.

name: Figaro
line: Back in the day, we thought it was impossible for humans to kill magical beasts. But now there are too many humans.

name: Cain
line: We need to start by getting people to trust wizards. Where in the world is the root of all evil — Owen?

name: White
line: We’re not close enough to pay him a home visit, you see.

name: Cain
line: This is about the Northern wizards, so please, pull yourselves together. What are Owen’s special characteristics?

name: Snow
line: He can speak to beasts, such as wolves. He was a huntsman, after all. He's also skilled at absorbing magic.

name: White
line: Wizards usually obtain their magic from nature, but Owen is a bit special.

name: Snow
line: He gains his power from human emotions. That's why we think he can’t be too far from where humans live......

name: Heathcliff
line: I apologize for interrupting, but Shino came across a visitor just now......

name: Shino
line: We have guests. Can I bring them in?

name: Cock Robin
line: It's been a while, Sir Sage. Um, this is......
I'm Canary, Cock Robin's wife. Thank you for taking care of my husband.

name: Akira
line: Work here at the magic headquarters......?

name: Canary
line: Yes! I just couldn’t sit still after hearing what he told me!

name: Canary
line: That's not all. Come on, say it.

name: Cock Robin
line: Hey, give me a moment...... I need to prepare......

name: Canary
line: Stop mumbling. Muster up some courage!

name: Cock Robin
line: I...... I'm a scribe...... Making a record of events is my job.

name: Cock Robin
line: I was wondering if you would let me write about everyone here until the next < Great Catastrophe > arrives?

name: Akira
line: Why would you...... Is it because you don't trust us......?

name: Cock Robin
line: No, it's the other way round. I want them to understand — what wizards are like, and how they saved the world, and so on.

name: Cock Robin
line: This was actually Sir Drummond's suggestion. But he said to keep it a secret, so please don't tell him......

name: Akira
line: Thank you...... I'm sure everyone else will be delighted too.

name: Canary
line: Sir Sage, mister wizards. I'm sure there will be lots of trouble lying ahead of you all, but please never give up.

name: Cock Robin
line: Time to record everything I can! So when wizards use too much magic, their hearts become exhausted, and they grow fatigued......

name: Cock Robin
line: ......You surprised me! Why did you do that?

name: Cock Robin
line: The Western wizard Murr enjoys surprising people......

name: Murr
line: You’re writing it down! What a diligent guy!

name: Canary
line: Delicious! I didn't realize the extra step would make it taste so much better.

name: Nero
line: Glad I could help. Okay, I need to go now......

name: Canary
line: Mister Nero, could you teach me more about cooking from now on? If you don't mind, that is.

name: Canary
line: I'm not that good at cooking, I’d be very grateful for your help.

name: Nero
line: I guess...... Once in a while......

name: Shino
line: We still don't know what Heath's bizarre injury is?

name: Heathcliff
line: Don't bring it up...... I'm getting more and more anxious.

name: Cain
line: Hopefully it’s not one of the painful types. Shylock looks like he has it rough. Though it’s pretty inconvenient not being able to see people until I touch them.

name: Shino
line: What kind of injury could you handle?

name: Heathcliff
line: Umm...... Sneezing yourself into the distance seems kind of fun.

name: Bradley
line: "Seems kinda fun?" This isn't a damn joke.

name: Shino
line: Oh, so you get blasted away seriously?

name: Bradley
line: First things first, you bastards need to......

name: Riquet
line: I’m sorry! Mitile and I were blowing dandelion puffs!

name: Cain
line: No worries. You guys did a great job.

name: Akira
line: ......I woke up in the middle of the night...... Guess I’ll have a cup of tea before I go back to bed......

name: Akira
line: ......It's coming from the door to that room......

name: Lennox
line: What are you doing up so late? ......Where is this snow coming from......?

name: Akira
line: It seems to be spilling out from the cracks in Faust's door.

name: Akira
line: ......Is this some kind of spell? Lennox, do you know what this is?

name: Lennox
line: He might have set up a barrier. Sir Faust is a very cautious person, after all.

name: Figaro
line: What are you two up to?

name: Figaro
line: Stand back. I'll open the door.

name: The window reflects the hill of execution. On the ceiling
line: a boy who looks just like Arthur. Figaro and Lennox are there, too

name: Figaro
line: Let's get out of here before he wakes up.

name: Lennox
line: ......Was that the bizarre injury that the < Great Catastrophe > left on Sir Faust?

name: Figaro
line: Probably. It looks like the exact thing he would hate more than anything else in the world.

name: Akira
line: Were those illusions in Faust’s room images from his past......?

name: Figaro
line: It wasn’t just his past; his desires probably manifested a part of those images, too. I didn't participate in the final battle.

name: Figaro
line: I abandoned the front lines. Faust still resents me for it. But I didn’t leave because I was struck by panic.

name: Lennox
line: Of course it was possible to resist execution. But Sir Faust believed that Sir Alec would never carry it out........

name: Lennox
line: I will never forget that day...... But I never realized that he still dreamed of it so vividly, even now......

name: Figaro
line: If he discovers the truth about his bizarre injury, Faust will probably say that he’s leaving the magic headquarters.

name: Akira
line: ........... Lennox, are you all right with that?

name: Lennox
line: ......I would like you to tell him what's going on. Even if it ultimately leads to Sir Faust leaving the magic headquarters......

name: Akira
line: ......If you choose to stay here, I will do anything I can to support you, Faust.

name: Akira
line: I really would like you to stay here at the magic headquarters, Faust. But......

name: Faust
line: ......But I want to set up a powerful barrier to prevent my dreams from overflowing. I’ll head out to the East in order to obtain the appropriate medium.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust. Please take me with you.

name: Lennox
line: I'm sure I can at least serve as a watchguard. Please, let me join you.

name: Faust
line: There's nothing I can do for you anymore.

name: Lennox
line: I never wished for you to do anything for me. I simply want to be of use to you.

name: Faust
line: .......Have you been searching for me all these years?

name: Lennox
line: I wandered through many lands. Though I’ve been in the South ever since I met Sir Figaro, the one who taught you magic.

name: Lennox
line: Why are you apologizing? I was able to meet you again. And this time, I will follow you to the ends of the earth.

name: Faust
line: I'm just looking for a medium. I won't abandon my students and run away — I'm not Figaro.

name: Lennox
line: Sir Figaro was worried about you too.

name: Faust
line: I, too, once wanted the trust of a certain human. But I simply made a fool of myself.

name: Akira
line: Even so I....... I want to believe that you will return, so I will wait for you here.

name: Rutile
line: We were in the middle of repair work, and I'm still worried about how everyone in Central is doing......

name: Akira
line: But what if they chase you away like last time......?

name: Figaro
line: It's been a while; we should be all right. People aren't really afraid of Southern wizards anyway.

name: Mitile
line: I want to go help alongside nii-sama too! Plus...

name: Riquet
line: Mitile invited me, so...... I want to see if I can use my powers to help people.

name: Riquet
line: I'll think about whether I want to return to the Church after that.

name: Akira
line: I understand. Everyone, please be careful.

name: Rutile
line: Mister Leno was able to make up with Mister Faust, right? Mister Leno seemed so happy.

name: Figaro
line: It's not like they had a falling out, actually. Faust was just avoiding him. Leno used to be Faust's servant.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Faust seemed kind of scary, but if he’s an old friend of Mister Leno, then he must be a good person.

name: Figaro
line: That’s right. Well then, Sir Sage, we’ll get going......

name: Bradley
line: You're going to go help out with repair work, right? I'm joining you to get my pardon. That’s fine by you, right, Sage?

name: Mitile
line: But you wanted to ditch so badly......

name: Rutile
line: See, everyone here is a kind person at their core. Let's get along, Mister Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: Yeah. Give me a sec. I’m gonna get ready.

name: Nero
line: Hmhm~. Let the meat sauce cook overnight~......

name: Bradley
line: Hey, come here for a sec.

name: Nero
line: Woah!? What the hell are you doing!?

name: Bradley
line: Cut the humming. The bloody chef Nero sure lost his edge.

name: Nero
line: Not yet, you idiot! What the hell do you want? If you're just here to pick a stupid fight, I'll make it rain pepper.

name: Bradley
line: Hold off, you idiot! Hey, tag along with me tonight. We’re gonna sneak off to the Lunar Eclipse Palace in Central.

name: Bradley
line: Yeah. All the treasures they took from me when I got captured are stashed away there. I’m gonna use this opportunity to get them back.

name: Nero
line: Stop messing with me! I said I went clean!

name: Bradley
line: It’s not stealing. I'm just taking it back.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, and you stole it in the first place......

name: Bradley
line: What was that, Nero? Are you gonna put up a fight? Do you think you stand a chance?

name: Nero
line: ......I thought getting thrown into jail might’ve helped you fix that attitude, but you really haven’t changed at all......

name: Bradley
line: Shut up. You should just listen to my orders.

name: Bradley
line: Come on, buddy! Fine, I’ll make this the last time. We’ll go our separate ways after this, Nero.

name: Nero
line: ............ So this is really gonna be the last time?

name: Bradley
line: That's how I feel right now. But I tend to change my mind easily.

name: Bradley
line: Alright. Can I eat this meat sauce?

name: Nero
line: Don't touch it, fucker! It still needs to simmer. Want me to turn you into meat sauce?

name: Rutile
line: Were you taking an afternoon nap?

name: Mithra
line: No...... I've had trouble sleeping lately......

name: Rutile
line: I see...... Shall I bring you some herbs that will help with your sleep? You can put them inside your pillow.

name: Mithra
line: What do you want from me?

name: Mithra
line: What I lent to who......? What are you talking about?

name: Rutile
line: A skinny, intelligent child in the Central capital. He said he was carrying something that belonged to you, Mister Mithra.

name: Mithra
line: Huh...... I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Mithra
line: You always talk about things that make no sense.

name: Rutile
line: ......Sorry for bothering you. I hope you get lots of rest.

name: Cock Robin
line: Mister Rutile! Would you let me ride on your broom? I’d like to make a report to Sir Drummond.

name: Rutile
line: Of course, I’d be glad to!

name: Canary
line: Have a safe trip! Take care, dear!

name: Figaro
line: You’re a lucky guy, Cock Robin.

name: Akira
line: See you later. Take care, everyone.
