name: Cain
line: Looks like the Southern wizards have headed off to Central. I wanted to join them, but the higher-ups have been keeping a close watch on me lately.

name: Cain
line: See, they've started these baseless rumors. Something about me colluding with a powerful noble from another country, and selling information about the Central troops.

name: Shino
line: A powerful noble from another country?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. I don't know anyone like that.

name: Heathcliff
line: I...... I think it might be me......

name: Cain
line: Oh, right! I forgot you were something like a nobleman’s son!

name: Shino
line: "Something like a nobleman’s son"? Know your place. You're just a former knight; Heath is of higher status than you.

name: Heathcliff
line: Yeah, speak for yourself first, Shino.

name: Shino
line: What? You were the one who got all embarrassed when I called you "my lord." I wanted to call you that.

name: Cain
line: I get you, I get you! It makes you feel like a loyal vassal. I've addressed Prince Arthur like that before.

name: Heathcliff
line: And what did Prince Arthur say......?

name: Cain
line: He was surprised, and then he laughed.

name: Cain
line: Hey, don't call him a dude. He's my master.

name: Heathcliff
line: You two are peas in a pod. I'll go make some tea.

name: Heathcliff
line: ......See, you say all that, but then you make me brew your tea. If we were at home, a servant would be yelling at you right now.

name: Heathcliff
line: Did you see someone outside the window just now?

name: Cain
line: I mean, I can't see anyone, so... ..........!

name: Heathcliff
line: Where are you headed with your sword, Cain!?

name: Cain
line: There’s only one guy I can see!

name: Akira
line: Ah...... Sorry, I forgot to knock. Did I surprise you?

name: Cain
line: This voice... Is that you, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Yes. Let's shake hands...... Can you see me now?

name: Cain
line: Yeah. Be careful. Owen's here in the magic headquarters. I'll go check the courtyard.

name: Cain
line: Where are you...... Owen! Owen, show yourself!

name: Cain
line: I'll go check. You stay here.

name: Akira
line: Yes...... Um, please listen to what Owen has to say. He has no memory of what happened at the time.

name: Cain
line: If I listened to Owen, I'd go mad.

name: Cain
line: What are you saying......? Everyone in the country is looking for you! What did you do to Captain Nicholas!?

name: Owen
line: Nicholas told me. He said that you're the strongest knight in the land, Cain.

name: Owen
line: I thought that if I was a good boy, Sir Knight would come to save me. Did you come to save me?

name: Owen
line: A dark, damp place. There was nothing but rats and moles. That's where I lived.

name: Cain
line: ...... What are you talking about? I won’t fall for it. You’ve fooled me one too many times playing at weakness and sadness.

name: Cain
line: Stop with your creepy acting! What are you up to!?

name: Owen
line: ......Are you mad because I took your eye, Sir Knight......?

name: Cain
line: Exactly! Your left eye belongs to me, you know!

name: Cain
line: D... Did you just say sorry...? Hey, seriously, what's wrong, Owen......

name: Owen
line: I'll give it back to you right now...... So don't get mad......

name: Akira
line: ......You're bleeding. Let's go treat your eye, Owen.

name: Cain
line: ....I'm not mad at you anymore. Let's fix you up.

name: Shino
line: Oh, you hurt the white of your eye. Look this way. I'll do your eyedrops.

name: Shino
line: You don't need to stick out your tongue.

name: Heathcliff
line: Amazing...... I can’t believe Owen is obediently letting Shino do his eyedrops.....

name: Cain
line: Just watching them is making me go mad...... Why in the world is this happening?

name: Owen
line: I'll do my best with the eyedrops, so please watch me.

name: Cain
line: Y... You got this~. I'm so proud of you. There. There.

name: Heathcliff
line: You know, he would've killed you twice by now......

name: Owen
line: ......I don't want to do this anymore......

name: Shino
line: You got this. You can totally handle it.

name: Cain
line: You’re doing great, I'm so proud of you~.

name: Heathcliff
line: Y... Yeah, you can do it~.

name: Cain
line: Can't you use magic? You stole my eye with magic. Don't stick your finger in your eye anymore.

name: Owen
line: Nicholas said I was a wizard.

name: Cain
line: Nicholas...... Do you remember what you guys talked about? Why did he fall?

name: Owen
line: Um...... Because the town was destroyed.

name: Cain
line: Can you give me some details?

name: Owen
line: Um...... Will you be proud of me if I remember?

name: Cain
line: Of course, of course. You got this.

name: Owen
line: Um...... Nicholas wanted to become a wizard.

name: Owen
line: He helped with Nova's ritual, and that’s what messed up the town.

name: Heathcliff
line: Take responsibility...... So that really was a suicide attempt?

name: Shino
line: Well, if you helped summon the < Great Catastrophe > and it ended up wrecking the whole world, I guess it would make you wanna die.

name: Akira
line: So Owen really never manipulated his heart......

name: Shino
line: So is this happening to Owen because of his bizarre injury from the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Heathcliff
line: Most likely...... I can’t believe Owen, who’s like the embodiment of evil and fear, turned into this......

name: Cain
line: No, I prefer him as he usually is. This just makes things hard for me......

name: Cain
line: I'm so proud of you! I'm proud of you, and I'd also like you to remember a few more things.

name: It’s a face that I’ve seen before
line: he’s frozen, as if at a loss.

name: Cain
line: Come on, Owen. Do your best, and try to remember. If you do, I'll praise you with my whole heart!

name: Owen
line: What are you going to praise me for? Sir Knight.

name: White
line: Sage, we figured it out! The identity of the Umbra Volans!

name: Snow
line: Oh, Owen. I didn't realize you came back to the magic headquarters.

name: Owen
line: I can come back whenever I want.

name: Cain
line: Stop putting up a front. If this is the same as when Nicholas fell, you shouldn’t remember anything about what happened just now.

name: Cain
line: You were really attached to me.

name: Shino
line: You let me do your eyedrops.

name: Heathcliff
line: You wanted us to praise you......

name: Snow
line: My goodness...... So Owen's bizarre injury completely changes his personality?

name: Owen
line: Don’t be ridiculous. At least come up with something better.

name: Cain
line: What about this damp, dark place?

name: Cain
line: You said there was a picture book. Where a knight saves people who are in trouble......

name: Owen
line: I have no clue what you’re talking about.

name: White
line: We need your cooperation! Something horrible is about to happen!

name: Owen
line: Then there’s really no reason for me to help. Because I love horrible things.

name: Owen
line: The whole world should fall into madness — screaming, blood, and fear.

name: Heathcliff
line: But we got some really important clues out of him. We should be able to figure out what’s going on once we interrogate Nicholas.

name: Shino
line: Snow, White. What about the identity of the Umbra Volans?

name: White
line: A spell that was sealed away in ancient times...... The Festival of the City of the Dead.

name: Snow
line: It is a large-scale summoning spell where the dead of the lost city are brought back to life, and every living being is offered up as fodder for their revival.

name: White
line: < The Omen of Umbra Volans > is the bird that symbolizes the beginning of this festival.

name: Snow
line: Judging from the time it appeared — the dead should begin coming back to life tonight.

name: Cain
line: ......Oh god...... But wasn’t the ritual performed at the Lunar Eclipse Palace supposed to summon the moon?

name: Snow
line: They offered old human bones instead of living sacrifices, right? That's why the ritual transformed.

name: White
line: Nicholas is a military man; his job is to protect the people. I suppose even he could not gather living humans.

name: Heathcliff
line: But according to the Western wizards, the same kind of ritual was conducted all over the world......

name: Shino
line: Some of them must've actually used living humans. This Nova guy might have guided them from the shadows.

name: Snow
line: Look for the moonstone that was used as the medium.

name: White
line: Unless we purify the moonstone, the Umbra Volans will materialize, and the dead will start to come back to life.

name: Shino
line: This is a great opportunity to make a name for myself. I'm headed to the capital.

name: Cain
line: I'll go too. I need to report this to Prince Arthur.

name: Heathcliff
line: I'll join you. What will you do, Sir Snow and Sir White?

name: Snow
line: Dusk is approaching. Once the sun has set, Oz cannot use magic.

name: White
line: Owen isn't around, so we need to secure Mithra’s assistance. Sage, do help us convince him.

name: Snow
line: Thank you. Mithra has been very irritable lately, you see.

name: White
line: It must be due to sleep deprivation. He needs to stop staying up all night......

name: Akira
line: Cain, Heathcliff, Shino. I'm counting on you.

name: Cain
line: I apologize for leaving your side. Please leave the capital to us.

name: Mithra
line: What is it now...... People certainly enjoy speaking to me today.

name: White
line: This isn’t the time to be lazing around. We’re in serious trouble.

name: Snow
line: It will eventually be yours. Some people tried to summon the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Mithra
line: The < Great Catastrophe >......? Why? Are they perverts?

name: Akira
line: W-we don't know what their goals are. But according to Owen, someone named Nova is involved.

name: Mithra
line: Oh. I've never heard of him.

name: Snow
line: If we leave him alone, he might do the same thing again.

name: White
line: For now, the capital at Central is about to fall into grave danger. Could you lend us your strength?

name: Mithra
line: No, that sounds like a pain......

name: White
line: Mithra, dear! Be a good boy!

name: Mithra
line: Couldn’t you just ask Oz? That man can basically handle anything.

name: Oz
line: The sun is still up. I can easily cast a spell right now.

name: Oz
line: Would you like to see if I can control you as I wish, Mithra?

name: Mithra
line: And in turn I will make you my slave at night. Threatening me like this — you must have a request to make of me.

name: Oz
line: I do not make requests. For wizards do not act on requests.

name: Mithra
line: Exactly. I'll be a savior once a year — that's more than enough. I will spend the rest of the day sleeping.

name: White
line: Were you trying to persuade him without a plan in mind......?

name: Snow
line: Oh dear. So you just made Mithra mad, then......

name: White
line: If only Oz had a tiny fraction of Figaro's silver tongue......

name: Oz
line: I'll put an end to everything before night falls.

name: Mithra
line: Oz. May I ask you something as well?

name: Mithra
line: Why did you choose to serve? You used to be an emotionless, absolute ruler. Why should you care about the Central capital?

name: Akira
line: Oz...... I think Oz found something precious to him.

name: Akira
line: What about you, Mithra? Don’t you have something precious that you want to protect...... Could you please lend us your strength to protect that?

name: Snow
line: Mithra’s connections with other wizards are few and far in between, after all......

name: White
line: He was close with Tiretta, but she has turned to stone.

name: Snow
line: The witch who raised Mithra like a mother.

name: White
line: Weren’t they lovers? Though Tiretta ultimately married a human.

name: Mithra
line: She was neither my mother nor my lover. Just an old, troublesome connection.

name: Snow
line: Is that so? When Tiretta found you as a child, she said, "He's handsome, so I'll make him my lover."

name: White
line: But then she said, "He grew up to be a pathetic man, so I decided against it."

name: Snow
line: On the other hand, the Southern brothers grew up to be such good children. Rutile and Mitile are both so amiable.

name: Mithra
line: Rutile and Mitile? Do those two know Tiretta?

name: White
line: What are you saying? They're Tiretta's sons. You were invited to Rutile's birthday party, remember?

name: The next moment, a completely different sight lies before our eyes
line: it’s as if only that particular segment of space has been torn out of the air.

name: Snow
line: So you're finally in the mood to help us, Mithra.

name: White
line: Right, right, teleportation is a piece of cake for you! So you’re going to take us along?

name: Mithra
line: No, this is a personal problem.

name: Snow
line: No, I think that’s not quite true.

name: White
line: Judging from how panicked Mithra was...... He might have made some kind of promise with Tiretta.

name: Snow
line: Wizards use magic with their hearts. If they betray their hearts...... If they break a promise or a contract, they lose their magic.

name: White
line: That is why wizards do not make promises. Because when a wizard makes a promise he cannot keep, the mysterious powers he once controlled refuse to do his bidding.

name: Snow
line: Tiretta predicted her own death before she gave birth to Mitile.

name: White
line: There are only so many promises a mother would ask a powerful wizard to make if she foresaw her own death.

name: Akira
line: A promise Mithra made with Tiretta......

name: Rutile
line: Sigh...... I guess Mister Mithra really forgot......

name: Riquet
line: It will help you recover your strength and lift your spirits — it can also work as a slight protection charm.

name: Central Country man
line: How much should we pay you......?

name: Riquet
line: No; I can't accept payment. Please make use of it.

name: Mitile
line: Riquet, your sugar is so neatly-shaped and pretty!

name: Riquet
line: Mitile, your sugar was also solidly packed and very delicious!

name: Figaro
line: Sigh...... We still have lots of patients. There are fewer people with serious injuries now, but it looks like a lot of folks are having trouble sleeping.

name: Rutile
line: I heard the same thing. Apparently there's an eerie sound coming from below the earth.

name: Figaro
line: The air kind of feels dark, too — there was more rubble last time we came, but it seemed more lively.

name: Bradley
line: Alright, we made it inside. But what the hell's going on here......? The underlying balance is in complete chaos — there’s no sense of order anywhere.

name: Nero
line: The Western wizards didn't make it sound this bad...... Maybe the contamination spread?

name: Bradley
line: What are you saying? We already made it this far. Just leave it to Bradley the Great. Let's get started.

name: Nero
line: I can sense it approaching. Here it comes. But from which direction......

name: Bradley
line: From below! It's gonna swallow our shadows......!

name: Nero
line: What the hell was that!? The shadow just passed beneath our feet!

name: Bradley
line: It’s slithering up along the walls. We can’t crush it if it has no physical form.

name: Nero
line: Hey...... What the hell is that...... Something’s coming out of the wall......

name: Nero
line: Haha...... Isn’t that nice. It wants to play with you.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, nobody told me it was gonna be such a huge fucking bird!

name: Nero
line: ..........You're always like this! You taunt the enemy without thinking about what’s going to happen next!

name: Nero
line: I'm never tagging along with you again!

name: Bradley
line: Okay, I get it! Let's leap out of that window! You take the right, I'll take the left! Let's go!

name: Nero
line: ......The Lunar Eclipse Palace is gonna fall apart!

name: Bradley
line: That bird is fucking gigantic! How did it fit into that palace!? Ah, dammit, it's coming this way......!

name: Nero
line: Yes! Right was the better window! I'm always choosing the right from now on!

name: Bradley
line: Stop prattling on and help me out here....!

name: Nero
line: If you can turn it into grilled chicken, I'll carve it up nice and proper for you!

name: Bradley
line: Tch......! I'll shoot you down with my rifle, you giant bird bastard!

name: Nero
line: ......If that thing starts rioting in the city, it’s gonna be a total disaster! I need to do something......!

name: Bradley
line: What, you're going!? I thought you hated humans!? What a joke, Nero!

name: Nero
line: Shut up! You don't need to come with me!

name: Central Country man
line: This wind feels really creepy...... It’s all warm and moist like someone’s breath......

name: Central Country man
line: The sky is a really eerie color too...... It looks as red as a forest fire......

name: Central Country man
line: But I can hear it...... It sounds like an army of bees buzzing...... Or an excited cow panting......

name: Central Country man
line: I want to go home before night falls, but it’s getting dark already......

name: Central Country soldier
line: Ugh...... What an awful night keep watch over the cemetery......

name: Central Country soldier
line: We have no choice...... Sir Nicholas said that we can’t let the wizards cause any more commotion.......

name: Central Country soldier
line: Cut it out, don’t scare me......

name: Central Country soldier
line: ......Hey, don’t you hear it...... It sounds like something wet being dragged along the ground, or like a frog being squashed......

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, Mitile, Riquet. Gather your stuff. We’re heading to the castle.

name: Figaro
line: He can probably manage. Things are looking pretty bad...... The chaos is spreading......

name: Riquet
line: Is something going to happen? Should we warn the people?

name: Figaro
line: Tell them to close their doors and windows tight, and absolutely avoid going outside tonight.

name: Mitile
line: ......! Everyone's running this way......! What happened over there!?

name: Figaro
line: Take caution and run. That goes for you three, too — flee with her!

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry about me. Go on ahead first.

name: Mitile
line: B-but......! Please don't show off just because you're an adult!

name: Figaro
line: Don’t worry about me, Mitile. I'll catch up in no time.

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, take care of Mitile and Riquet.

name: Rutile
line: ......Got it. Dr. Figaro, please be safe!

name: Figaro
line: Ah, this feels so good...... I was such a good person back there.

name: Figaro
line: Now then, I’ll take you on.

name: Cain
line: Dammit! We didn't make it in time!

name: Heathcliff
line: They're coming from under the bridge, too...... .......hh.

name: Shino
line: ...There’s so many of them. Cain, there’s a swarm of the living dead coming from 8 o'clock. Can you fight them even if you can't see?

name: Cain
line: Yeah, thanks to their rotting smell. Let me know if a citizen walks by.

name: Cain
line: I'll protect this castle — I swear on my honor as the leader of the Order of Knights! Even if they took away my title.

name: Heathcliff
line: But something's wrong...... His limbs are twisted into black wings......

name: Shino
line: Tch...... It's taken over his body. That guy’s done for.

name: Cain
line: Where's Heath!? Is he all right!?

name: Shino
line: He fell under the bridge! Heath! Heathcliff, answer me......!

name: Mitile
line: Pant... Pant... Will Dr. Figaro be all right!?

name: Rutile
line: He's a brilliant man, so I'm sure he’ll be okay! Riquet, can you still run?

name: Riquet
line: ......Yes! But may I ask a question......!?

name: Riquet
line: Why are we running instead of flying......!?

name: Rutile
line: I got swept up because everyone else was running.....

name: Rutile
line: Ah...... It’s the child who’s keeping Mister Mithra's package.....

name: Rutile
line: He might be injured...... I'll quickly check on him! If anything happens, you two should take to the skies!

name: Rutile
line: Are you okay? You look so pale...... And your hands are so cold......

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Don't touch me...... Uu...... ......Mine...... It's mine......

name: Rutile
line: Yours......? ...... Sorry, I'm going to roll up your shirt.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Don't touch me...... Don't touch me......!

name: Riquet
line: His stomach is swollen...... Like a snake that swallowed an egg......

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Uu...... So long as I keep this in my stomach...... It'll become mine......

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra...... Mister Mithra put a jewel in your stomach?

name: Mithra
line: You ran away, so I was forced to search for you.

name: Mithra
line: You've been possessed by desire. I suppose the stone was too valuable for a child like you.

name: Rutile
line: This child...... What's going to happen to him......?

name: Mithra
line: He'll die. Because I'm slicing open his stomach to take out the stone.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Mithra! That’s awful! I can't believe you'd do that to such a small child......

name: Mithra
line: I'm going to need all of you to die.

name: Rutile
line: I'm all right! Run away, you two! I'm going to take this child and escape from here!

name: Mithra
line: You won’t get away from me.

name: Rutile
line: Why don’t you try keeping up with me in the sky, then!

name: Rutile
line: Both of you run! Head towards the castle!

name: Rutile
line: I refuse! I'm taking him to Dr. Figaro!

name: Mithra
line: How would you like to die?

name: Rutile
line: You aren’t even listening to me!

name: Mithra
line: Would you like to be burned to death? Or would you rather be roasted to a crisp by lightning?

name: Mithra
line: Looks like you avoided a direct strike, but you can no longer keep flying.

name: Rutile
line: ......Don't worry....! I'll take you somewhere safe!

name: Mithra
line: A powerless yet troublesome eyesore...... You’re just like a pest.

name: Rutile
line: ......That monkey's arm you gave me was plenty pathetic as well......!

name: Mithra
line: It's time for you to die.

name: Rutile
line: When Mother died, when Father died — when it was just Mitile and me — you were my heart’s anchor, Uncle Mithra!

name: Akira
line: ......! That flash of red in the sky just now......

name: Snow
line: Glad to know that he's nearby.

name: White
line: But he might end up wrecking half the capital.

name: Oz
line: Mithra doesn't know how to hold back......

name: Snow
line: Well, it's better than letting this place become a capital of the dead.

name: White
line: Now, let's hurry to Arthur’s side.

name: Mithra
line: Sigh...... My goodness, that was close. It looks like my doppelganger has also disappeared.

name: Rutile
line: I-I can’t believe you! You’re lucky everyone already fled to safety — if someone had still been outside, they would've been terribly injured!

name: Mithra
line: Okay...... I only need to protect you, so.

name: Mithra
line: Where's the little brother? I need to find him and collect him.

name: Mithra
line: That's right. I'm going to seal you two away and bury you deep underground in permafrost.

name: Rutile
line: That's not what a promise is.

name: Mithra
line: I didn't make a promise because I wanted to.

name: Rutile
line: Then you don't need to protect us anymore. Just leave us alone.

name: Mithra
line: I can't just do that — that's the problem!?

name: Rutile
line: If it’s such a problem, then you never should've promised her anything in the first place! Why did you make a promise with Mother!?

name: Mithra
line: I've lived a long life, so I'm used to parting ways with people.

name: Mithra
line: Tiretta was like a master to me. She taught me magic; she taught me how to live. She had no common sense, and she was an absolutely wild woman, but......

name: Rutile
line: Don't speak so rudely of my mother.

name: Mithra
line: ......... When I told her, "I will protect your children," Tiretta looked so happy......

name: Rutile
line: ......I'm sorry for yelling at you. Mister Mithra, you really cared for Mother in your own way.

name: Rutile
line: This is bad...... Mister Mithra, can you remove whatever is in this boy's stomach?

name: Mithra
line: Can I slice his stomach open?

name: Rutile
line: I want to save him. Can you save him even if you have to slice his stomach open?

name: Mithra
line: I've never really tried that. Will you complain if I mess up?

name: Rutile
line: Um...... How about this? Can you find Dr. Figaro for me?

name: Mithra?
line: I see the rumors about you were true, Mithra of the North.

name: Central Country soldier
line: Prince Arthur! The people are surging towards the castle! They speak of strange incidents......

name: Arthur
line: Open the castle gates, and let the people take refuge inside the castle.

name: Vincent
line: Are you inviting people into the castle!? What happens if something nefarious sneaks in with them......

name: Arthur
line: Uncle, please speak no further. Set up accommodations at once.

name: Arthur
line: The cemetery, the Lunar Eclipse Palace — we warned you over and over again, Uncle! And yet you refused to listen each time!

name: Vincent
line: Someone like you has no right to.......!

name: Arthur
line: Did you just say "someone like me"?

name: Arthur
line: I am the successor to the crown of Central Country — the First Prince Arthur! Know your place!

name: Arthur
line: Oh no, I got too worked up...... They're going to start rumors about how terrifying wizards are again......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Snow, Sir White! Sir Sage, and Sir Oz too......! I’m glad you’re all safe!

name: Oz
line: The twins are trapped inside the frame, but yes, we are fine. Is everything all right on your end?

name: Arthur
line: No, things are looking quite terrible. The city is overrun with the living dead......

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Arthur. Oz just wanted to know whether you were hurt.

name: Arthur
line: Ah...... No, I'm not hurt anywhere. I’m doing fine!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Arthur. In the worst case scenario, the city will become a capital of death, overrun by the living dead.

name: White in the portrait
line: We shall set up a barrier around this castle. Let us lend you our strength.

name: Arthur
line: Thank you! There is just one more thing I'd like to ask of you......

name: Arthur
line: Drummond and the Magical Technology Corps are working together to hold off the invasion of the dead.

name: White in the portrait
line: Do not worry. We have already sent powerful support their way.

name: Cock Robin
line: Sir Drummond...! They’ve broken through the barricade!

name: Drummond
line: I-I see. Have the citizens all fled?

name: Drummond
line: I'm sorry, Cock Robin. You're a newly-wed man, and yet I made you come along......

name: Cock Robin
line: What are you saying, Sir Drummond!? We’re getting out of this alive!

name: Drummond
line: Run, Cock Robin! I'll hold them back......!

name: Murr
line: That was surprising! You looked like you were about to get eaten, so I made you a mouse!

name: Cock Robin
line: Sir Drummond! Thank goodness you're safe......!

name: Shylock
line: The flocking, maniacal dead...... This isn't a very beautiful sight.

name: Rustica
line: I suppose this means I won't have to look for my bride right now.

name: Chloe
line: Mister Drummond, Mister Cock Robin! You guys have been through so much! Leave the rest to us!

name: Shylock
line: Grab ahold of your pen. We'll show you a series of miracles so bountiful that you won't be able to keep up.

name: Rustica
line: Oh, it's going to be on the record? Then I guess I need to show off a little.

name: Chloe
line: Eh~! I would've worn my new clothes if I had known!

name: Mitile
line: I-I think I'm going to trip over my tongue......

name: Riquet
line: Mitile, your spell seems so difficult to chant......

name: Mitile
line: I said the same thing to Dr. Figaro, but he said we should stick with this......

name: Riquet
line: B-but, I've never used magic to attack anything! Father Priest forbade me......

name: Mitile
line: Now’s not the time for that!

name: Mitile
line: Imagine something powerful! Give it a go!

name: Riquet
line: Something powerful...... A tornado......? A big tornado......

name: Mitile
line: ......! Th-that was some amazing force, Riquet!

name: Mitile
line: Wh-what should we do! There's so many of them in front......!

name: Riquet
line: They're going to attack us from both sides!

name: Bradley
line: That was a close call, you Central and Southern tinies.

name: Mitile
line: Where were you all this time, Mister Bradley!? I thought you came to do volunteer work!?

name: Bradley
line: Hey, I saved you; that counts as volunteer work. Want me to charge you?

name: Mitile
line: I thought you were cool for a second there, but nevermind! You're the worst!

name: Mitile
line: Mister Bradley, Mister Nero! Please save my brother!

name: Nero
line: Was he attacked by the dead?

name: Mitile
line: He was attacked by Mister Mithra......

name: Bradley
line: I don't wanna fight Mithra. That guy doesn't know a thing about chivalry or justice.

name: Shino
line: Shut up and get out of my way!

name: Cain
line: ......Nicholas! We’ll settle this once and for all!

name: Cain
line: ...... If you admired wizards, why didn't you say so!?

name: Cain
line: I’ll grant you this final mercy
column3: I’ll end you before you shame yourself in front of Prince Arthur.

name: Shino
line: He smells the same, and his eyes are the same color, too! I thought he transformed with magic, but that's not it!

name: Shino
line: Hold him down! I'll put him to sleep right now!

name: Shino
line: ......I told you to hold him down!

name: Cain
line: He was about to bite me! I can't just punch him, right!?

name: Shino
line: Why did this happen!? Is it because of the living dead!? Did he eat something weird!?

name: Cain
line: No! Look at the back of his hip. His crest is darker than usual. This is probably......

name: Shino
line: ......! His bizarre injury from the < Great Catastrophe >......

name: Shino
line: ......Got it. I'll get through to him with words. We've been together for a long time. I won’t let some < Great Catastrophe > get between us out of nowhere.

name: Cain
line: The < Great Catastrophe > existed way before you two were born, you know!

name: Shino
line: Heath, listen closely. I wished for you to become arrogant.

name: Shino
line: ......Look at that. You know how to yell real loud.

name: Shino
line: Heath, please come back to your senses. I don't want to hurt you. Please, I'm begging you.

name: Chapter 21
line: A Story for the Sage's Manual

name: Lennox
line: Are you all right, Sir Faust?

name: Faust
line: Of course. But I never thought we'd run into this kind of uproar on our way back from Eastern Country......

name: Lennox
line: It might be better to meet with Prince Arthur before we return to the magic headquarters.

name: Lennox
line: Would you rather not? He does look like Sir Ale—mghgh.

name: Rustica
line: What's this? The moon is being covered......

name: Shylock
line: Is that tremendous bird the Umbra Volans......?

name: Cock Robin
line: Th...... That thing is going to cover the whole castle......

name: Akira
line: I didn't realize it was this big......

name: White in the portrait
line: Well then, Arthur. We will be heading off.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: No need to worry. We will protect this castle with our barrier.

name: White in the portrait
line: We're leaving the rest to you, Oz.

name: Central Country man
line: Don't worry...... The wizards will protect us all.

name: Central Country man
line: Just as they protected us from the < Great Catastrophe >......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Sage. I will go out as well. I will divert the bird’s attention to keep Sir Snow and Sir White's barrier from being destroyed.

name: Arthur
line: Please do not worry about me. I am Sir Oz's pupil, after all.

name: Arthur
line: Yes. Please take care of Sir Sage.

name: Cain
line: There’s a barrier around the castle......! It must be Sir Snow and Sir White!

name: Shino
line: .....Now we just need Heath to get back to normal....!

name: Cain
line: The dead keep coming...... Looks like they headed this way after being repelled by the barrier.

name: Shino
line: We sure are popular tonight. Heath! It's me, Shino! Please return to your real self......!

name: Shino
line: ......He just gave me a little scratch.

name: Cain
line: You’re bleeding horribly. You've done enough; you should run awa......

name: Shino
line: The dead turned to dust in an instant......

name: Owen
line: He is a beast. Did you know I get along with beasts?

name: Cain
line: You! Don't you dare lay a finger on Heath! I won't forgi—....

name: Cain
line: I can’t move my legs either...... Stop it, Owen! I'm begging you, please stop......!

name: Owen
line: There, there...... Good boy. You’re so cute, rubbing your cheek against my hand.

name: Shino
line: Heath! ...... I can move my legs......

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust! There's a man with what looks like wings over there!

name: Lennox
line: It’s Nicholas from the Magical Technology Corps. Does he intend to fuse with the bird......?

name: Faust
line: Is that so? How troublesome. I had absolutely no intention of helping Alec's descendant.

name: Lennox
line: You’re a terrible liar, as always.

name: Faust
line: ......You're a wizard. Why did you default to close combat? Use magic.

name: Lennox
line: I'm sorry...... I just punched him reflexively......

name: Faust
line: That's enough. I'll put an end to you.

name: Faust
line: Stop spectating and help us out.

name: Figaro
line: You didn't need my help. By the way, have you seen Rutile and the others?

name: Mithra
line: Impossible...... How could I be overwhelmed by any wizard aside from Oz......?

name: Nova
line: I have no business with you. Rutile of the South, hand over that child.

name: Mithra
line: Are you absolutely sure about this? Can't we just hand him over......?

name: Rutile
line: M-Mister Mithra, you can run away! I'll protect this child myself!

name: Nova
line: Well then, I'll take him by force.

name: Mithra
line: ......I won’t let you. I can’t have him turning to stone, you see.

name: Bradley
line: Hah......! I got him! Mithra's a difficult opponent, but the three of us can probably handle him together.

name: Nero
line: Yeah. I don't know who you are, but you put up a good fight. Good job.

name: Mithra
line: ......Cough...... Bradley, Nero...... You really did it this time......

name: Mithra
line: Come on, hurry. Please, don't die.

name: Mitile
line: I wonder if Mister Bradley and Mister Nero are okay. They said not to follow them, but......

name: Faust
line: Two children, alone in a place like this......?

name: Riquet
line: Figaro, Faust...... Bradley and Nero flew towards the sky over there to save Rutile!

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro, please save this child!

name: Rutile
line: Something has been buried inside his stomach! Some wizard named Nova did it......

name: Figaro
line: ......This is...... The moonstone is inside him.....

name: Faust
line: The young wizards should stay away from him. There's a horrendous amount of chaos spinning within him. It’ll affect you.

name: Lennox
line: Come over here, Mitile, Riquet. Rutile, are you feeling okay?

name: Rutile
line: Y-Yes...... Can you save this child?

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry, Dr. Figaro is a skilled physician. ...But goodness, this is terrible. I can’t believe he hid the medium inside a human body.

name: Riquet
line: Ah...... It feels easier to breathe now......

name: Rutile
line: You can do it..... You'll feel better very soon.

name: Figaro
line: Let's begin. There’s nothing to be afraid of.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Fufu...... It's my jewel...... Mine...... Mine......

name: Figaro
line: You have been swallowed by your role. You were made to take care of the moonstone — but that is not who you are.

name: Figaro
line: Tell me your name. Even without the jewel — you are still you. You shine more beautifully than the moon.

name: Figaro
line: Jude. What a wonderful name for a hard worker. You're a hero, Jude.

name: Rutile
line: The stone is coming out......! Jude, you can do it......!

name: Faust
line: The moonstone is in a terrible state.

name: Figaro
line: It doesn’t look any different, but yes. If it falls into the hands of humans who know no better, they'll suffer misfortune after misfortune — people will surely die.

name: Oz
line: No...... At this rate, the barrier will reach its limit.

name: Oz is right
line: cracks flare up over the barrier every time the bird throws its beak against it.

name: Oz
line: When we saved Faust from the brink of death, you transferred magic to me. Can you do that again now?

name: Oz
line: A sage is one who guides wizards. Theoretically, you should be able to grant me power and draw my power out from me.

name: Murr
line: It's the Umbra Volans! It's huge!

name: Rustica
line: I don't think it'll fit in my birdcage.

name: Akira
line: Why is it attacking only Arthur......?

name: Oz
line: Because he's the prince of Central Country. The Umbra Volans is attached to him, for it too was born on Central ground.

name: Oz
line: ......I won't let you have your way.

name: Oz
line: I'm sorry — but you are going to share my fate.

name: Oz
line: Grant me strength, Sage. You are the one who guides us.

name: Mithra
line: Rutile won't be coming back. Now it's easier for me to fight.

name: Nova
line: You think you stand a chance against me?

name: Bradley
line: All right. Guess I'm already on board.

name: Nero
line: Geez. I thought I was comfortably retired......

name: Owen
line: If you beg me, I'll help you out.

name: Mithra
line: Let's have some tea at the Central marketplace. I'll treat you to cake.

name: Bradley
line: Well then. Let’s get this started.

name: Nova
line: Hmph. No matter how many of you there are....

name: Owen
line: You can't move anymore. And now......

name: Owen
line: I'll show you what's inside my trunk.

name: Owen
line: Huh, you managed to dodge his attack.

name: Mithra
line: Welcome. I opened this door through space just for you — right into the magma reservoir of a blazing volcano.

name: Bradley
line: Hey......! You really should've listened to the end there!?

name: Bradley
line: Because it sounded like he was about to tell us his identity and stuff!

name: Mithra
line: But I didn't want him to show up again......

name: Bradley
line: Even so......! God, you really are an idiot......

name: Mithra
line: Sigh...... It's fine. He was pretty badly injured, so he probably won't appear again for a while.

name: Owen
line: Oh. I need to close my bag.

name: Mithra
line: I’ve suffered through that more than enough times......

name: Shylock
line: So you can use magic now.

name: Rustica
line: It’s even more powerful than the rumors say......

name: Chloe
line: So this is Oz, the most powerful wizard in the world......

name: Murr
line: Ah......! The Umbra Volans is fleeing this way!

name: Oz
line: Don't think you can get away from me.

name: Central Country man
line: The tower...... Our tower was rebuilt in an instant......!

name: Central Country man
line: He took down the monstrous bird......!

name: Heathcliff
line: Nn...... Huh......? Why am I wearing Cain's jacket......?

name: Shino
line: Don't worry about it. ......But let me say this first.

name: Shino
line: I'm so glad you're safe, Heath.

name: Bradley
line: Ew, gross. What's with these feathers......

name: Owen
line: The whole town is pitch black. This is fun.

name: Nero
line: The sky is filled with morning light, but the ground is as pitch-black as night.....

name: Nero
line: Shut up, Brad. Shut your mouth.

name: Figaro
line: They won’t do any good; we should purify them.

name: Mitile
line: But...... There's so many feathers. Can we really purify them all?

name: Faust
line: It'll be fine. There are twenty-one wizards. Everyone just needs to work together.

name: Mitile
line: Eastern wizards like being alone, but you said everyone......

name: Riquet
line: Let's work hard! If we all work together, we’ll be done in no time.

name: Jude
line: The city is pitch black...... Am I still dreaming?

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry. It'll turn pure white soon enough.

name: Central Country man
line: Woah...... The black feathers are glowing white and disappearing......

name: Chloe
line: Ahaha, they're all waving to us!

name: Shylock
line: You're right. Humans really are self-serving.

name: Murr
line: Shylock, I cleaned up my area!

name: Shylock
line: My, what a good boy you are. Can you handle another round?

name: Cock Robin
line: Prince Arthur! I'm so glad you're all right!

name: Arthur
line: That goes for you two as well — thank you for protecting the people. Ah...... Let me turn you back.

name: Drummond
line: ......Squee, squeak.... Prince Arthur......! How could you act so recklessly......!

name: Arthur
line: I apologize for making you worry. But I had the support of reliable comrades.

name: Arthur
line: Let me introduce him to everyone here. He is the man who raised me, and my master of magic

name: Oz
line: ......I am Oz. Thank you for watching over Arthur.

name: Drummond
line: I-indeed, it's exactly as you say......! I thought my heart was going to stop yesterday!

name: Oz
line: I understand how you feel. When he was little, he stumbled across the fort of the Ice Witch while chasing a rabbit, and......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, please don’t tell him about my past! It’s embarrassing!

name: Cock Robin
line: Ahaha! How strange...... This is just like a parent-teacher meeting!

name: Snow
line: My, goodness. I'm glad everything worked out in the end.

name: White
line: Sage, that was quite the undertaking.

name: Akira
line: Yes. But I'm glad everyone is safe.

name: Snow
line: You're right. Everyone worked so hard.

name: White
line: Oh? Is that the king's younger brother......?

name: Vincent
line: The Sage’s wizards saved us this time.

name: Snow
line: What's this all of a sudden?

name: White
line: I take it that you want us to stay silent about how Nicholas was involved in all this?

name: Snow
line: It was a huge mistake on your part, after all.

name: White
line: I wouldn't be surprised if the other countries demanded reparations from you.

name: Vincent
line: ...... What do you say, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Of course, we’d be delighted to!

name: Central Country man
line: It's the new Sage and his wizards!

name: Cain
line: What roaring applause! Even if I can't see everyone — I can still feel the sight before my eyes.

name: Riquet
line: I'm so glad everyone is safe and happy.

name: Snow
line: Everyone looks like they’re having fun.

name: Mithra
line: This is the first time I've worn such formal clothing.

name: Owen
line: Me too. Matching clothes are weird and interesting.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph. Well, this doesn't feel bad.

name: Shylock
line: Murr, you really do love fireworks.

name: Rustica
line: I'm glad we could all wear your outfits together, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Yeah! I didn’t think the Northern wizards would wear them too!

name: Shino
line: Not bad. I feel like I've taken over this castle.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey, don't make such unsettling comments......

name: Nero
line: Geez, everyone can see me now...... Guess I have to close my restaurant in the East.

name: Faust
line: You should open shop in the magic headquarters. I'll drop by for a meal once in a while.

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama! Everyone is smiling and waving at us!

name: Rutile
line: Yes. It makes me happy to see everyone smiling.

name: Figaro
line: We all worked hard — that goes for everyone here, and the people in the castle and the capital, too.

name: Rutile
line: ......By the way, did we ever figure out what Mister Mithra's bizarre injury is?

name: Murr
line: You're right, Mithra’s the only one we haven’t figured out yet. Mine is that lots of me's appear!

name: Mithra
line: I don't care. More importantly, I'm so sleepy......

name: Mithra
line: I can't fall asleep, you see. That's why I haven't slept for days.

name: Arthur
line: That sounds horrible...... When was the last time you slept?

name: Rutile
line: I'll give you some goods that will help you get a good night’s sleep.
